1121.content:
You stood outside the house of a person that the empire suspected was about to be assassinated. You were a member of the Jaegers, although no one but the actual Jaegers and Esdeath knew about you, and for good reason. The reason was your Imperial Arms, something you liked to call Morpher. It was made from the guts of a danger beast well known for it's ability to change size. You were on a mission to wait for Night Raid, jump on them and find a way to their base.

You went into a washroom nearby and shrunk yourself. Upon reaching your small size, you ran back towards the person who was going to be killed, a fat glutton who tortured women and children in his basement. You climbed up his flabby back, trying to ignore the smell that people naturally emit when they don't take showers. Upon reaching his head you set up camp, and now all you had to do was wait.


Just a couple minutes later you saw a black haired girl with piercing red eyes who looked suspiciously like Kurome. She was rather stunning and definitely and incentive to essentially following her home. She held a sword in her hand which gave you an idea to who exactly she was. She was Akame, the wielder of Murasame, a blade that kills with one cut. She cut through the man you were on almost instantly and then moved forward to collect something off of him. In that brief moment you decided to...

1151.content:
You stood outside the Capital of the Empire. You were a member of Night Raid, a group notorious for going against the empire's tyrannical ways. You had an Imperial Arms that you called Size Changer and it was a bracelet that was forged using a special organ used for a certain type of danger beast to change size. The reason you were at the capital however wasn't because of work. You were doing a favor for a fellow Night Raid member Akame which was to spy on her sister and make sure she's alright.

Of course, this wasn't the sole reason you had come. Akame had shown you a picture of her sister and you grew enamored at first sight. You had used your Imperial Arms to perv on people before but inside Night Raid headquarters you were outlawed from using it to perv on people because there was a large amount of female members that would probably destroy you in the heat of the moment. Your Imperial Arms made you very durable when shrunk so you could withstand being stepped on or sat on with little to no pain, but every member of Night Raid had an Imperial Arms and those tended to blast through most defenses.

You went to an alleyway nearby the entrance and looked around, before shrinking yourself to infiltrate. Another benefit to your Imperial Arms was that it boosted your physical abilities by a large amount, even in shrunken form. You scaled the wall and reached a window leading to one of the many rooms that the Jaegers bunked in. You had memorized a map before hand and knew exactly where to go. When you looked inside you saw...

A: Kurome eating her cookies in bed with a book.
B: Korome undressing and preparing for a shower.
C: No one inside. Time to prepare!

1152.content: What happens with the fearsome and sadistic general?
1152.title: Esdeath

11523.content:
“Come ooon. Just a little… further.” You grunt out as you drag your haul into one of your many holes throughout the palace. Just as you heard a patrol begin to round the corner, you manage to finish getting this week’s food inside before getting spotted. While it would look like nothing more than crumbs and scraps to others, to you, it was a week’s worth of meals.

Because unlike them, you were about the size of these crumbs, each one nearly the size of your body. You hated this fact, but ever since that day, there was little you could do about it. “Damn that guy.” You mutter under your breath as you begin to dig into lunch for the day.

*****

You weren’t always like this. You used to be a normal-sized person like all those guys out there, living out in the countryside as a simple farmer. Out there, crops alone could never really feed the whole village by themselves, and it was rare to ever get food traded to them from the rest of the empire. Because of this, you were taught how to survive if needed, how to hunt, fighting danger beasts, what to eat and what not to eat, stealth, and so on. It wasn’t a great life, but it was yours. At least it was, until he showed up.

One day, you were out trying to get some food for your mother back home. You had just bagged a nice deer, and even a C-class danger beast that could be worth something of a bounty if you sold it. As you prepared to drag it back home, however, a man appeared before you. You couldn’t get a good look at him thanks to the cloak he wore, but you could at least tell he was male.

“Can I help you, sir?” You asked him, trying to be polite. He said nothing in response. Instead, he threw up his cloak, with some sort of bright light emitting from underneath it. As you were blinded, your body began to feel weird before you lost consciousness.

When you awoke, you made two discoveries. First, you were now only about six inches or so tall, around the size of a doll now. The other, you now seemed to be in the imperial palace. How you got so far from your home in the mountains you weren’t sure, but judging on the lavish decor and the excess of soldiers roaming the halls, it was a safe initial bet that you later confirmed in your time here.

You had no idea who that guy was, where he was now, or what he had to do with this, but you were sure he was responsible. But, it wasn’t like you could just wander around like this. If you, a commoner, were found in the middle of the imperial palace, you would most likely be executed on the spot.

You spotted a nearby mousehole. You knew that if it was occupied, the current owners wouldn’t be too pleased to you coming in. So you found a discarded sewing needle and practiced a bit with it before heading in. After killing the rats that now stood over you, you found not only your new home, but your new way of getting around the palace mostly unnoticed. Turns out these vermin got around, as they had tunnels that led to rooms like the kitchen and several other parts of the palace.

You knew you had no way home or of surviving out there like this. So, you instead used these tunnels to survive until you found a better option. You would survive, and live on until you found a way back to normal and back home. You just needed to keep hope.

*****

That was nearly three months ago, and you have since gotten a routine going on “appropriating” food and other supplies, as well as occasionally fighting off relatives to the family you “evicted” to live in these tunnels. You were no closer to getting back to normal or going home then you were when you woke up like this, but at least you’re alive, and you kept hope strong.

Today was supposedly some sort of feast to commemorate the start of some group who answered solely to Esdeath. The Jaegers they were being called by the guards who patrolled the place.

So naturally there was a wide array of scraps to pick from..but you had to be quick. The maids and janitors had their duties after all. And you didn’t want to miss out on great scraps OR get swept up into the bin with them.

Imagine your surprise and disbelief when a large hunk of chicken had been left on the carpet. It was almost too big to carry, but you had fashioned a few harnesses to drag the particularly hefty food items some time ago.

Scurrying across the floor to the morsel, you quickly found yourself with some kind of cage slammed down over you. “Aw crap! I knew it was too good to be true!” You wail.

“Hmm...I’ve seen you around the palace, but this is the first time I’ve seen you up close.” The thunderous voice of Esdeath said as she peered through the tiny bars at you.

Crap. I’ve been spotted. You think to yourself as you look back at the giant blue-haired woman staring dead at you.

During your time here, you’ve heard plenty about general Esdeath and her reputation. You knew about her tendencies towards torture and cruelty. You wanted to quiver in fear at the idea of someone like her now having you trapped, but you had to keep up a strong front for now and hope for the best.

“Hmm. No fear despite being cornered like a rat. Interesting.” She murmurs as she slides a bottom under your cage and secures it before picking it up. She then notices one of the maids staring at her holding the cage with you in it. “Go and inform the Jaegers that I will be delayed.” She orders as the maid scurries out. Esdeath left the kitchen as well, heading in the opposite direction.
11523.title: A Tiny Scavenger

115232.content:
You knew your situation wasn't good, in a cage being carried away by General Esdeath the Empire's strongest and cruelest fighter. But you also know her tendency to torture the weak, you knew that if you showed fear it would spike those sadistic tendencies and inspire her to cause you excruciating pain. You keep a straight face as Esdeath takes you to a door, she opens it revealing a luxurious room.

You've never been here before, the palace staff probably make sure the vermin don't ever go near her personal quarters.

The giant woman than sat on her bed and brings the cage up to her face.

You see those giant blue eyes with light blue eyelashes, is that make up or natural?

She then opens the cage and her giant hand goes in and grips you tight. You groan as her gargantuan fingers squeeze you.

Esdeath brings you up to her face as she puts the cage next to her on the bed.

"Well little thing, do you know who I am?"

You were perplexed that she asked at first but replied as composed as you could. "Yes mam, you are General Esdeath, the Empire's strongest."

Esdeath grinned as she heard that. "And do you know what I am capable of?" Her eyes had a startling glint in them.

Before speaking you take a second to control yourself and speak as monotoned as possible. "Yes, you are a powerful warrior with a powerful Teigu that can create large amounts of ice."

She rose an eyebrow as you stopped. "Anything else?"

You were wondering why she was asking you all this but reply before she gets impatient. "You like to fight the strong and torture those you see as...weak." You curse at yourself for hesitating, you wanted to have a strong front and you gave her a sign of fear.

Esdeath caught that hesitating, that was fear. Her grin widened at that which sent shivers down your spine.

She brought her finger and pushed it against your face.

"So you do fear me." She states and pulls her finger away from your face. And she sees that you still kept the straight face you had when she found you. "And yet your able to feign that you lack it."

Is this where she tortures you? Your fighting to keep the hope you had these pasts months from escaping. You vowed you will do eveyrthing you can to find out answers and what happened to you. To that you must survive this demon woman.

Esdeath then holds you by holding one of you arms between her large fingers. "No Teigu, how did you get this small?"

You explain how this happened to you as quick as possible.

"Faciniating little thing, now I wonder." She let you go and fall.

You scream a bit as you see her boot, insticitively you position yourself so that your able to slide off the boot safely land on the floor in front of the giant white boot.

You then looked at her foot wear and see it rise. You roll out of the way as she stomped where you just were. Then when you tried to stand her other boot moved and kicked you. This kick was really light, like a nudge and it sent you rolling until you hit your head agianst the wall.

You grip your head but knew better and kept gurad.

*Boom!* *Boom!*

You look ahead to see Esdeath casually walking towards you, her mere foot steps created earthquakes to you.

*Boom!* *Boom!*

You looked up to see the gigantic Esdeath smiling down at you, this made you shake in fear for a moment but you steeled yourself.

Esdeath sees you keep your straight face, you shook when you saw her stature then he stopped. This weak little thing continues to intrigue her. She rose her foot and stepped down quicker than you can react.

You put your hands against the boot pushing as much as you can. She wasn't trying you can tell, she was playing with you.

"I wonder how strong is that resolve of yours?" She cackled as she added more pressure. "When will you beg me for my mercy?"

This some sort of test? Not that it mattered, your chances are better if you keep yourself from fearing her, or at least acting like you did. You say nothing and push with all your might knowing that she can kill you at any moment.

Esdeath wondered, why hasn't she killed you yet? Your were small, frail, and WEAK. A taboo to her princibals. She should have just killed you right away, it would have been a favor. But there was something appealing about you resisting her, knowing it was futil. It was endearing in a way.

Without saying a word she pulled her boot off of you and put it next to you.

Exhausted you stood up a bit shaken, you look up at the woman that has your life in her hands.... or at her feet rather.

Esdeath smiled differently than usual. "I will let you live, your too interesting to simply kill, aren't you lucky?"

Lucky was one way to put it. You'll have to endure this woman until she gives you a way to escape. For now you should do as she says. What is her motive.

Esdeath looked down at you wondering what to do with you, she never had a weakling before. Perhaps she'll have him do things she had other weaklings do, or maybe this is something else. She has a certain feeling about you. Was this what she wanted from the emperor? Was this.... love? Why? He was weak, interesting but weak and unworthy of her. Should she explore these feelings or just play with him?

1152321.content:
Esdeath's enormous hand lowered down to you, you gulped as you lay there and allowed her slender fingers to wrap around you. Surprisingly, her grip felt more gentle.

You were brought up to her face, jolted slightly as she sat her rear down on the end of the bed. Uncurling her fingers so you were seated on her palm, Esdeath examined you once more.

She noted that you were fairly handsome and had a slim build but not overly muscular. Was toned the right word..? The way you gazed up at her with your pretend-bravery...it excited her.

Not to mention she could assert her dominance in a multitude of different ways from her usual norm. The thought of having a tiny one who would see her as a titan...nay...a goddess...made her quiver in delight.

You were quite nervous at the look she was giving you, and was she...trembling? Her eyes closed and her cheeks flushed, she was biting her lip.

This was creeping you out, she looked like she was about to have a full on orgasm right in front of you.

Then, her eyes opened once more, staring directly at you somehow without a hint of malice or cruelty.

Ookay...what's she planning..? You thought, knowing this was probably some cruel game she was about to play.

"I've decided." Esdeath boomed, an affectionate smile gracing her features.

"E-eh? Decided what?" You said in confusion.

"I wish to see if this is what love is. So you shall be mine from this moment onward. Congratulations." She chirped.

You paled at first, but tried to force yourself to look somewhat okay with it. This could be your chance to get on her good side, perhaps you'd find a way to escape.

But the thought entered your mind: This would mean a steady supply of food, you'd be under the protection of the great General too.

Maybe this wouldn't be so bad? After all, it's better than death.

You hoped anyway. "Yes, that sounds great!" You reply after coming out of your own thoughts.

“I’m so happy you say that my love!” Esdeath giggled, it surprisingly sounded very girly.

You always seen her hold herself as this all-powerful warrior, you never thought she had this side at all. Maybe if you play your cards right she’ll only show this side instead of the sadist you saw moments ago.

You are so wrong.

Esdeath calmed herself down and smiled this time maliciously, your heart was beating very quickly seeing that look. “Now my darling” Did she just say that?! She pet you with her giant finger. “You do know I love you right?”

You were surprised how gentle she was being. You wanted to get away, she was planning something, something evil! Her smile begins to falter, you answer quickly. “I-I do.”

“Good” Esdeath smiled and then she put her finger on your chest. “And you know who’s in charge correct?”

“Yes” You said it right away not wanting to incur her wrath.

“I’m happy you said that, however” Her smile grew evil again. She pushed her finger down on your chest hard, you felt air escaping your lungs. “I need to establish my role in our relationship.”

You put your hands on her finger and push with all your might. And it didn’t budge. “Y-you don’t need to!”

Esdeath giggled at feeling your tiny hands pushing her tree size finger. “Oh but I do.” She was enjoying using her mere finger pinning you down showing how mighty she was to her lover. But a thought occurred, her smile became more devilish and you were frightened by that.

You tried to not be afraid, she may kill you if she sees your fear, that might have been what made her make that lunatic choices of making you hers. But what is that face, what else is she going to do?

Esdeath stood up and dropped you on the ground.

You fall on your back and look up in pain. You see Esdeath looking down on you like an all mighty powerful goddess.

“Stay” She said as if you were a dog.

Her command was sudden and the tone was beyond commanding. You couldn’t help but obey and watch. You prey it wouldn’t be so bad.

Esdeath sat down staring down at you to make sure you didn’t run. She smiled as she put her hands on one of her boots.

You look up at her as she undoes her boots, she pulls but it seemed stuck. Was she wearing those all day. She starts pulling harder and harder it came off with a POP no doubt from the built up sweat, you can see her pale foot glistened from the sweat. What was she planning?!

Esdeath took off her other boot with the same POP sound and she breathed a sigh of relief. She placed her feet on either side of you, then she stood up to hold a god like stature. She smirked down at you.

You looked down at the giant feet, both were wider than you and twice as tall as you. Her giant toes wiggled as if eager to play with you.

“Daaarling” She sang.

You looked up to see her have her hands on her hips. Then you see her foot rose, you see the pale bare sole, shiny from the sweat and it came down.

You shake and try to run but her foot stepped down on your back.

Esdeath giggled at the sight, she loves feeling your little body from beneath her foot. The general decided to roll you so your own your back.

You were face up your head was between her big and second toe. You tried to push but you knew it wouldn’t work, you can see the grin on Esdeath’s face, you couldn’t even tickle her.

“Hmm, you feel so good down there.” She started tapping her big toe on your head.

You felt the bottom of her toe slap you over and over while she giggled. Her toe felt wet, slimy, smooth, and soft. You even tasted some sweat, it was salty you fought not to. You thought of begin but weren’t sure if that was what she wanted.

“Now, if you’d like me to take my foot off of you.” She began thinking while she rolled you on the ground, she wasn’t really thinking she was only toying with you to show who had the power in this relationship.

You felt her toes slap your face as she rolled you side to side with her foot.

“Oh I know!” Esdeath pretended she just got the idea and stops with you in between her toes again. “Kiss my toe over and over again. When I’m satisfied I will take my foot off of you.”

You should have seen this coming, you were dizzy from the rolling she did.

“Do you like being beneath my foot?” Esdeath asked as you were not kissing, she pets you with her big toe.

You swallowed what little pride you had left and look at her big toe. You pucker your lips and kiss her big toe. You felt the taste of her sweat again but steel yourself swallow the sweat and kiss over and over again.

Esdeath giggled feeling her tiny lover kiss her toe, it felt great as your tiny lips touched her toe. “Ah keep this up.” She blushed, she had the greatest warriors lick her boots clean but there was something special about you kissing her foot.

You kissed to the point where you are crying from the horrid taste of her sweat. And then to your surprise the foot rises, you put your hands on the ground and crawl out from beneath her foot.

Esdeath put her foot down at your side creating a mini earthquake. “Excellent work darling, I enjoyed that.” She giggled cutely.

“Y-your welcome.” You were just glad that it was over but then you see her other foot rise. “N-no wait!”

Esdeath stepped on you with her other foot. “Darling surely you know that both of my feet deserve kisses.” She pets you with her big toe.

You would have argued but knew it wouldn’t end well. You tilt your head to her big toe and kiss over and over again continuously.

Esdeath sighed this felt so great, this MUST be what love is.

After a while she took her foot off of you and put it on the side.

You slowly got up struggling as you were sore from your body being dominated by her mere feet.

“Now darling, you understand our relationship right? I am the Alpha Female, you are the Beta Male my enjoyment is your enjoyment.” She explained with her hands on her hips. “Do you understand?” She glared down at you to give you an idea of what pissing her off means.

How do you respond?

She says as she pops off her shoe, revealing her stocking-clad foot to the air, there seemed to be some light steam coming from her discarded footwear, as if the shoe itself was worn heavily. She then repeated the process with the other one. "Aaaaah." She sighs in relief of the freedom of her feet before returning to her thought. "So I see it as only fair that you put in some work to help them relax." She says as she props up her feet in front of him.

"Relax how?" Heath asks fearfully.

Scowling a bit at how dense he was being here, Mine rolled her eyes a bit before reaching down to her stockings and beginning to roll them off while she talked. "How dim do you have to be to work as an Imperial spy?" She asks as the first stocking came off, revealing a dainty and small foot with pink-tipped toes. As she set it back down in front of him, he found that her pudgy toes came to about eye level with him.

That's when the smell hit him. The smell itself was a rancid, cheesy scent, and the sheer intensity of it made him recoil a bit as it wafted over him."You are going to service my feet until I say you're done. Fail in any way and I'll punish you. Am I clear now?" She asks.

"Crystal, Mistress Mine." He says as his eyes watered.

"Good. Now then..." She starts. What does she have him do first?
1153131.title: Mine's Interrogation

11531311.content:
“Alright, shrimp! You’re going to rub my gorgeous feet and make them feel wonderful!” Mine orders sternly.

Heath cringes and cups a hand over his nose, visibly unsettled from the odorous fumes wafting towards him. Mine narrows her eyes and wiggles her pudgy toes threateningly.

“Something wrong, pathetic servant?” She sneers with a sinister tone of voice.

The spy felt a chill go up his spine then and he shivers under her glare. “N-Not at all Mistress Mine!”

Mine haughtily crosses her arms, “Then get to it! And while you’re down there start spilling your Imperial secrets!”

Heath gulps as he walks into a fog of pure foot stench and finds his face directly in front of her reeking and quite plump toes.

Mine deliberately spreads the digits and lets loose her toe crevice stank onto his nose.

“Ahhh, that air feels nice between my toes!” Mine gloats with a toothy smirk, knowing she has this insignificant pest writhing from her hard working tootsies.

Fighting not to cough or show any further signs of disgust, Heath puts out his hands and pushes them into the sweaty, undeniably soft soles.

115313112.content:
Heath pressed hard as he put his back into rubbing her sole. The tender flesh easily gave way to his touch, but the lack of any reaction from the angry titaness told him all he needed to know that she probably barely felt his efforts. Trying his best to ignore the smell, he pressed onward and tried to keep her as happy as he could. He hated having to rub the feet of his enemy, but at the moment, he had few options that didn’t include him getting flattened by her or the others he saw out there.

He continued to rub, hoping that soon she would either let him move on to the other foot, or get relaxed enough to where he could try and escape while her guard was down. However, Mine didn’t forget that her mission here was to interrogate you, and that the foot rub was just a perk. “Ahem. I believe I told you to start spilling those juicy imperial secrets of yours, bug.” She tells him.

Heath cursed himself a bit at her remembering. It looked like he’d just have to keep her satisfied for now. Maybe if he told her some minor secrets, he could survive this ordeal and get a slap on the wrist at worst. “Well, uhh… The imperial guard usually turn a blind eye to small crimes during the day, since you Night Raid guys usually only move at night.” He told her, hoping that would sate her curiosity for now. He then cursed himself a bit as during one push, his arm slipped in her sweat and caused him to faceplant into her damp sole, causing Mine to chuckle a bit at his humiliation.

How does she take the info?

You were Rikuu Zamikage, a two star student of Honnoji Academy. You were the head of one of the clubs that Ryuko had destroyed during one of the many brawls she got into.

You had been head of the Spy Club, a club dealing in all things of the spy-lifestyle..but mostly you had put the gear to work on being peeping perverts. Your club had kidnapped Mako Mankanshoku for unsavory purposes, but little did you know she was best friends with the infamous kamui wearer.

At this moment, the fruits of over three weeks of preparation were finally starting to show. In the ruins of what was your club base, you had been hard at work on the ultimate spy tech: A Shrinking Device!

"This'll show that damn Matoi! I'll shrink down to the size of a roach, and take diiirty pictures of her and spread them to the world! She'll probably die of the humiliation! Not to mention the personal delight of seeing that smokin' babe in the buff!" You wiped drool from your mouth as you made your way through the slums.

"Now, where was that bitch staying...the Mankanshoku residence right?" You finally noticed the huge neon lights and signs pointing at a house with the words: "BACK ALLEY DOCTOR!" blinking on and off.

"Sheesh...should've noticed that sooner." You grumble as you knock on the door, making sure your shrinking device is secured around your waist. It looked like a gaudy belt, but in fact it was a device that allowed you to shrink at will!

To your surprise, Mako answered the door. "Oh wait! You're that weirdo spy perv!" Mako said bluntly.

Your eye twitched but you kept calm. "Y-yeah, I guess...but I figured I should apologize for that stuff awhile back." You lied.

"Aw no sweat! It's all water under the bridge, I guess you've had some time to reflect since Ryuko pwned your entire club huh?" Mako said with a smile.

You couldn't tell if this girl was mocking you or if she was simply being blunt. Nevertheless you had to act fast if you wanted to get in there!

"Oh my, look over there!" You pull the most obvious trick in the book, and of course the bowl cut chick buys it. You shrink down to the size of a small insect and scurry in the door.

Sure enough, the loudmouth tomboy makes her appearance, her colossal white sneakers THOOM against the floor as she towers into the sky.

"Who is it, Mako?" The titan Ryuko thunders to her friend.

"It was that weird spy perv! He musta ran off though!" Mako answered.

"Just be careful, he might be planning somethin'." Ryuko scowls in anger at the memory of you trying to perv on her friend.

The anger and bitterness of your voice quite frankly made both girls flinched and stood back. They didn't suspect such a tiny thing have such powerful lungs. Even her weird uniform had looked shocked to a degree. But Ryuko only snarled back.

You are really are a pervert, and proud of it.

But you had your brain and knowledge and subterfuge of countless spies, ninjas, assassins, and other spooks and grifters both real and fictional by your side.

You weren't deterred that your previous plan failed, but there are multiple ways up a mountain...and Ms.Matoi is one hell of a range


"You know what, if we look at this objectively...this is like a scene from hentai? I, the perverted Kotaku, get punished by the overly edgy bad girl with daddy issues, i.e you Ryuko Matoi." Then you probably were going squish me between your ample bosom. Or perhaps flatten me into a pancake with your posterior. Maybe even..."

With large words corresponding with your hair color appeared out of thin. Matching your next sentence word for word

YOU ARE A PERVERT JUST LIKE ME.HELL, YOU ARE FLUSTERED AS WE SPEAK!

A person could drop a pen and it would sound like a massive gong. Everything got dead quiet, Ryuko's face was wide open, while the uniform's eye incredulously stared at you. You only grnned-you obliviously won the first battle of this war. While Mako only nodded.

With your smaller size, you easily climb onto Ryuko's shoe and hide behind her ankle. "Well, just keep your eyes peeled. No telling what exactly he has planned." Ryuko tells Mako as she slams the door shut.

Out of curiosity, she put her nose in her armpit for a few testing sniffs. "Whew, that's ripe. Guess I could go for a bath tonight, anyway." She mumbles.

Ryuko's attention was suddenly drawn to a small tickle on her sockless ankle. Looking down she furrowed her brow as she saw what appeared to be some kind of bug. "Sheesh, I know I reek but I shouldn't be attractin' bugs." Squatting down, the titan of a girl loomed over you.

"Crap crap crap!" You yelped and attempted to hop off of her sneaker..but the giantess' fingers were too quick and you found yourself plucked up. "Shiiiiiit!" You shriek and squirm as Ryuko's narrowed blue eye filled your vision.

"U-Uh..h-hello..." You whimper. "Wanted to sneak a peek at me so bad ya shrunk yourself, huh?!" Ryuko bellows in your face.

"N-no that's not it at all!" You defend, only for the titaness to scoff. "I should stomp on ya like the roach ya are! But I bet you'd like that wouldn't ya?!" She snarls.

"Not really my thing..." You murmur, only for Ryuko to squeeze you in her fist tightly. "Yeah yeah, you little runt..you just made a bad mistake!! You were a wimp before, but now you're totally helpless!" You didn't like that sinister grin she was giving you.

"Tell you what, you little perv. The insoles of these shoes were starting to get a little worn down. Looks like you decided to pull this at just the right time." Ryuko says as she sadistically smirks down at you.

"Wh-what are you gonna do to me?" You panic. Meanwhile, Ryuko is reaching down and slightly sliding off her shoe, letting the built-up steam from the day's fighting escape out past her heel.

"Come on mister spy. You're smart, you figure out what's about to happen to you." She says as she lowers you down into the steam, inches from being in her shoe. That was when you noticed something.

"You don't wear socks?" You ask as you stare at her bare heel.

"I usually do. But all mine were too dirty to wear today, so I had to go barefoot while I was kicking Honnoji Academy ass." She says. "And now, I'm thinking about going for a walk around town, and I could certainly use some support."

"W-wait. Don't I have a say in this?" You ask.

"Sure, you have a say." She teases, giving you hope for freedom. "You can either be my insole for the walk, or if you don't want that, I can just toss you to Guts so you can be his food. That's your say."

You shudder at the thought of being anything's food. "Insole it is." You shudder out.

"Good to hear." She says as she slides you through the steam into her shoe so you're on your back looking up at her foot. "By the way, I don't know how you shrunk yourself, but if you try and grow back without my permission, then I'll kick your ass until you want to shrink again."

With that warning, she slips her shoe back on, trapping you in the damp and cheesy prison, helpless to move at all. To Ryuko, it felt like she was stepping on a pebble in her shoe, yet, in a good way. It felt kind of nice to feel you under her foot. You however, had a different experience.

The inside of her sneaker was hot and damp. Every step seeped more and more sweat out onto you. You were trapped between her damp, squishy flesh and her firm insole of the shoe. You were half tempted to grow yourself out now and take your chances, but her warning rings in your ears and keeps you from doing so.

"I'm going out." Ryuko calls out to her host family as she exits the house.

Feeling her plump feet sink into her quite soaked insoles, Ryuko wore a smug grin on her face. She could feel you, her little 'pebble', being pressed into her thick sole. It was quite the power rush, the knowledge that she had a puny human trapped in her shoe as she wore it.

Unfortunately, your situation was amplified by the fact that it was a hot, humid evening. Ryuko started to sweat, and this was definitely not leaving out her stinky peds.

You felt her feet practically leaking gallons of salty sweat onto you. You wondered if you could ever wash the stench out of your clothes. Much less your skin...

Ryuko walked out past the slums and into Honno City, the fading sun did nothing to quell her sweat output.

"You are sweating all over me. I suppose I know how the poor man in your shoe feels." Senketsu said in Ryuko's mind.

Ryuko was savoring the torment she was inflicting on you. She had dealt with perverts before, and she's dealt with Satsuki's other club leaders coming after her, but she's never had someone get their ass thoroughly handed to them by her, then come back for seconds while making the fight even easier for her. She was gonna love when this was over and she watches you crawl out of her shoe on your hands and knees smelling like a dumpster, begging for mercy. Then she spotted something interesting. A bunch of bums were sitting around a roaring bonfire. That was when a devilish idea crossed her mind. She approached the group. "Hey bums. What's going on over here?" She calls out.

One of the men approached her. "Well miss, what you see here is where every now and then, those of us in the slums of the city gather as much driftwood as possible and put it all into one big fire to keep us warm and bond as a community." He tells her.

"Mind if I sit in for a bit?" Ryuko asks.

"Sure. Go right ahead." The man offers as Ryuko takes a seat right next to the blaze, propping her feet up as close to the fire as they can safely be. She chuckled to herself at what must be going through your mind now that she's turned up the heat.

You don't know what just happened out there, but all of a sudden the pressure of her footsteps left, only to be replaced by a baking heat inside her shoe. Whatever she just did, it turned her shoe into an oven. This not only started to make you feel like you were being cooked alive in there, but it also didn't help that the increased heat upped the amount of sweat being dumped on you tenfold.

To somehow make matters worse, all this heat and sweat was ripening Ryuko's odor from old cheese to almost smelling like something died in here. A fate you hope doesn't happen to you. Your eyes were watering at the intensity of the smell you were forced to now endure. You only pray that this ends soon and she takes pity on you.

What happens next?

As about an hour had passed, Ryuko had felt that you were sufficiently cooked in there and were ready to be let out. "Alright you bums, I've been hanging around here for long enough. It's time I got moving." She says as she stands up.

As she walked along some beaten path along the outskirts of Honno City, the laces on Ryuko's old footwear gradually, almost imperceptibly, began to loosen. While it might not have affected her much at all, you, on the other hand, were put into deep trouble.

-----


In the sweltering heat of this delinquent's smelly, beat-up sneaker, you were rhythmically pounded into the soggy insole and enveloped by her huge, meaty sole. They were still on their way to Namek in Kami's old spaceship, and Bulma had taken to lazing around and piling junk food wrappers on the floor. Not to mention she was dressed in a grey bra and panties...and she'd been neglecting to clean herself so she wasn't exactly smelling very ladylike.

"WAKE UP!" The roaring voice startled Krillin, getting him to snap his eyes open and come face to face with the ENORMOUS glaring mug of Bulma.

"B-bulma?!" Krillin squeaked, she was HUGE!

Bulma grinned smugly, "The one and only. See, you've just been given the honor of getting an invention of mine tested on you..since you've been so rude to me!"

"I-Invention?" Krillin was dazed and somewhat convinced he was still dreaming.

"Heh, yep! It uses the same technology as my old Shrinking Watch from back in the day!" Bulma waved what appeared to be a toy ray gun at him..ironically he was dwarfed by the thing that caused him to shrink.

"You..shrank me?!" Krillin gaped...even Bulma wouldn't-...well...yeah she would.

Bulma grinned confidently, "Yep! I figure since it's so dull around here...you could be my entertainment! Treat me like the queen I am and stuff."

They were currently in Bulma's messy bedroom of the ship, Bulma was still wearing nothing but her matching bra and panties...and her body was giving off the odor of stale sweat and b.o.
13111.title: Fun on the Road to Namek!

choices: She lowers her arm, trapping him in her pit
She wants to do something else
131112.content:
"Let's get your nose adjusted to what you're gonna be dealing with for the rest of the trip. I mean, I'm so unladylike after all. You're gonna need to handle a few smells." Bulma says as she reaches down at Krillin. The shrunken monk tried to fly away, but found his unable to get off the ground as the blue-haired inventor's fingers wrap around him and lift him up to her face.

"By the way, the thing I used to shrink you doubles to suppress your powers so long as you're shrunk like this. Now let's get started." She says with a smirk while raising her free arm. Krillin could already smell the odor from where he was held and it only got worse as she brought him closer to it.

"C-come on Bulma! Can't we talk about this? I-I'm sorry I called you unladylike. Don't do this!" Krillin begs.

"Too late Krillin. You should've thought about that before you were rude to me. Now you need to learn a lesson. I think spending the last month of the trip shrunk like this should teach you that lesson. Now, where were we? Oh yeah!" She announces before jamming Krillin head-first into her sweaty pit. She then began to roll him up and down her pit like a roll of deodorant.

The smell of Bulma's pits made Krillin's eyes water just from smelling them at a distance while he was normal size. Having his nose buried in the admittedly soft flesh has his eyes burning at the stink. He was also having his face coated in her sweat, making the experience even worse for him.

To top it off, Krillin had an impasse at the issue of breathing. If he inhaled through his nose then he got a hearty wiff of her b.o., but breathing in through his mouth got him a mouthful of salty pit sweat. There was no winner's here. If there was anything that Krillin took solice in, it was that Bulma at least took the time to shave this thing during all this lack of hygiene.

Now all he could hope for was that she would get bored of not just using him as a tube of deodorant, but of this whole shrinking business entirely.
131112.title: Bulma Stuffs Krillin Under her Arm

choices: Bulma Heard That! Now She's Pissed!
Krillin Tries to Struggle Free...But it's No Use!
1311122.content:
Krillin suddenly felt the pressure on his back increase, which pressed him deeper into the thankfully soft...but absolutely nasty skin of Bulma's pit. He heard the rumbling moans of the giantess as he was pushed deeper and deeper into the mushy flesh.

He was pressed deep enough that he was sinking into a mold of his shape, until finally, Bulma released him and he was left adhered to the sticky skin. Bulma smirked at her handiwork and licked her lips and nodded in satisfaction. "Perfect! Now you won't go anywhere or slip off...for this next part."

Krillin dreaded whatever this 'next part' was...and his horror did not subside as Bulma revealed what she had in mind.
"I want you, my insignificant little servant, to praise your queen...worship my armpits! That's an order! I want you praising my beauty and my lovely scent, while you literally KISS up to me...from in there!" Bulma haughtily exclaimed.

Krillin paled, his nose was in an unholy smelling hell...and now she wanted him to basically thank her for this torture!

Bulma licked her lips, getting rather turned on by her power. "And I'll add...EMPHASIS on the KISS part. Hehe!" Bulma caressed her breast in the grey bra that held them.

Her nipples grew hard and she let a sensual moan escape her lips. "Better hurry up....Queen Bulma is impatient!"

Krillin murmured, "I already know that..."
1311122.title: Serving the Blue-Haired Queen

choices: She wants Krillin to finish her off
She relocates Krillin while still masterbating
13111223.content:
Krillin also knew that Bulma was scary enough when he was normal size and had his powers. At his current status, she was outright terrifying. Seeing no other option, he steeled himself. He only prayed that his sense of taste died before too long. He closed his eyes and slammed his puckered lips into her sweaty pit.

Bulma felt his kiss, but only one. "Come on servant. You'll have to do better than that if you want to satisfy me, and don't forget to praise me and my divine smell." She orders as her hand drifts down from her breast into her panties.

He knew this wasn't going to be easy, but he had no choice in the matter. He continued to kiss the sweat-covered flesh again and again. Every now and then, he would stop for air and use the time to shout praise to her.

"Oh great Goddess Bulma! Your beauty is unmatched by the moon itself! Your pits smell like the finest of perfumes!" He calls out in between kisses. He lied through his teeth about the smell, but he couldn't deny that even as unkempt as she was now, she was still hot as hell.

Meanwhile, Bulma was savoring the power she held over the man that insulted her so, who under normal circumstances would be able to flatten her with ease, but now was at her absolute mercy. She began to finger herself at the feeling of the tiny man worshipping her. The wet noises from her nether regions could even be heard by the tiny man in her pit, still kissing away and praising her.

What happens next?

13113.content: Who else can Bulma shrink?
13113.title: Bulma's Victim List

choices: Vegeta Gives in and Rubs Those Smelly Feet!
131131.content:
https://i.imgur.com/EdJozjZ.png


“I can’t believe you talked me into this..” Vegeta grumbled as he stood in front of a large machine. The device resembled a microscope only with a large ray aimed at the Saiyan prince.

“Oh calm down, I need someone to test it on.” Bulma said as she tinkered inside the machine’s circuits. “Why not get Trunks?” Vegeta growled.

“Because he’s out playing with Goten and I figured if something went wrong, you'd be able to handle it Mr. Tough Guy.” Bulma cheekily replied.

“Wait, you mean there’s a chance this could go wrong?” Vegeta asked. “N-no! Not at all! Your wife is a genius after all!” Bulma waved off his concerns.

“This doesn’t involve time travel does it? Beerus told you-” Vegeta started to say, only for the blue-haired scientist to interrupt him. “There’s nothing to worry about, no time travel..this time. It’s just a machine that’ll shrink you down to a certain size.”

“What?! You’re not turning me into some miniature doll!” Vegeta yelled out.

“Alright! We’re ready to go!” Bulma quickly shut the panel and flipped the switch before her hubby could move off the target area.

Vegeta was hit by a green energy beam, in an instant he dwindled down to around 6 inches tall. “Woah! It actually worked on a living organism!” He heard Bulma’s thooming footsteps approaching and her thunderous voice.

“W-wait a minute! You mean this was the first time to test it on something living?” Vegeta shouts up at his wife. “You mean to tell me you didn’t have a rat or a monkey or something to try on first?”

“Of course I had a monkey go first. You were the first one to step in, after all.” Bulma says with a small chuckle at her joke.

“Oh ha ha, very amusing.” Vegeta says with a roll of his eyes. “Now that I’ve proven the stupid thing works, grow me back already!”

“Alright, alright, jeez. You could at least try and be happy that your wife pulled this off before you get all shouty.” Bulma says before reaching for the switch again. However, when she pulled it this time, the switch simply sparked and sputtered. “Huh?”

“Bulma… What was that?” Vegeta asks.

“Hang on. Let me try again with a little more ‘oomph’.” Bulma says as she lifts the switch up and pulls it down once more with more force than before. This time, rather than a few simple sparks the ray part of the machine completely exploded, leaving little of it actually working. “Uh oh!”

At this point, Vegeta was gritting his teeth in fury. “How long is it gonna take to fix?” He asks.

“Uh… hehehe, abouuut… a month?” Bulma says a bit nervously as she looked down at Vegeta. “Hey, don’t get mad at me. It’s not my fault the thing blew up!” She snaps before he could. “Besides, maybe this is a blessing in disguise.” She muses.

Vegeta raises an eyebrow, “And how’s that?”

Bulma crossed her arms under her chest, fixing the puny Saiyan with a glare. “You are ALWAYS training and focused on surpassing Goku! Remember when we went to the amusement park with Trunks? You wouldn’t even hold my hand or help carry our things!” Bulma scolded in her booming voice.

“S-so?! What’s that got to do with-!” Vegeta started to smart mouth, only for Bulma to stomp her foot and thunder: “I’m not done!”

“It wouldn’t KILL you to show your wife some tender love and care y’know!” Bulma sneered.

“W-well...I…” Vegeta avoided her gaze, having a bad feeling about where this was going.

“So! Since I’m your only hope of getting back to normal...I feel I should be compensated for all this hard work I’ll be doing.” Bulma gained a smug grin.

Vegeta growled, “And why would I do that?! It’s YOUR fault I’m like this!”
Wrong thing to say.

“My fault, huh?” Bulma says as her anger begins to boil over. “I apologized that this happened, but the least you can do is not be a jerk about it! I shouldn’t even have to threaten you with growing you back to get you to actually show me some affection for once. But nooo, you gotta be all big and macho about it, don’t you?”

“Uh… I…” Vegeta stammers, caught off guard by his wife’s anger. While Vegeta was still, Bulma quickly snatched him up out of the machine. And began to carry him out of the lab. “Wh-where are we going, woman?!” Vegeta snaps as his voice returns.

“I am taking you to our room where you are finally going to show me some appreciation and affection.” Bulma retorts as she enters their bedroom and locks the door behind her before carrying Vegeta over to the bed and dropping him on the floor.

“Oh really? And what exactly are you expecting me to do from down here?” He asks.

Bulma didn’t answer. Instead, she reached down for one of her boots and began to tug at the footwear, grunting as she did so. “Come… on… stupid thing!” She says before it finally popped off in a cloud of steam, showing her wide, pudgy foot, the soft and supple flesh coated in sweat and with shapely toes, tipped blue like her hair wiggling and twitching around. “Ahhh.” She sighs as she drops the boot and reaches for the other.

The smell from the boot already hit Vegeta. “What the hell are you doing, woman?” He shouts.

“We’ve been married for how many years, and you never even bothered to offer me a simple foot rub?” Bulma says in a passive-aggressive tone as she removes her other boot and sets both of her now-bare feet on the floor in front of her husband. “Well that changes now.”

The two gargantuan peds hit the floor with a mighty and sickeningly wet slap. Those plump toes wiggled and wafted their hard earned stink at the saiyan. Vegeta clutched his nose and groaned as Bulma slowly lifted her feet up on their heels.

“It’s time for you to show me some appreciation, dear husband.” Bulma’s voice boomed down at him as those thick soles were now on full display and dripping before him.

Vegeta coughed and gagged at the potent stench he was being blasted with. “You...FORGET IT, WOMAN!” Charging up his ki, Vegeta attempted to fly away.

Unfortunately for him, due to his small size..his speed was limited. Vegeta ended up with Bulma raising her rancid foot over him and plopping it down so he was trapped under her cheesy arch.

“Gah!” Vegeta coughs out as the impact of the foot knocked the air from his lungs. Even worse, in attempting to refill them with oxygen, he was instead met with a concentrated blast of her toe funk.

“I wouldn’t try to run again. Looks like this new size of yours has drastically cut your power, slowing you down to a crawl, and if I’m riiight…” She says before pressing down even harder on his body, making him cough again as his arms instinctively shot up to try and push her off… to no avail. “Yup, you’re weak as can be.”

“Fan...tastic, honey.” Vegeta grunts as he struggles just to hold up the massive foot.

“I hadn’t expected this to happen, but now that I know, it can only increase the use of this device.” Bulma trails off ecstatically. “Just imagine if Frieza or any other clown that comes to Earth to destroy it shows up, just to get blasted with this bad boy and be made weaker than Yamcha. We might not have to be afraid of Beerus anymore. No more kissing up to that cat and his uppity angel, now we just have to threaten him with this once it starts working!” She cheers.

Meanwhile, Vegeta was at the breaking point. Without his saiyan strength, his arms were beginning to give out on him. “Damn it, get off of me!” He calls out, snapping Bulma out of her ranting.

“Oh right.” Bulma says as her attention returns to the matter at hand. “Well that’s on you, my little prince. Are you ready to drop the tough guy stuff and treat me like the princess I am for once, or are you gonna keep being stubborn about it and stay down there?”

A grumble came from her husband before the prince resigned to his fate. “F-fine!” Vegeta called out. Bulma grinned in triumph and lifted her smelly foot away, placing it none too far away back with it’s twin. “That’s what I like to hear.”

Vegeta gasped in the fresh air, thankfully her reeking feet were propped up a little ways away so the air wasn’t as tainted. “Now..about that foot rub.” Bulma reminded him.

Scowling, Vegeta trudged towards the thick soles of his wife. Bulma snickered as she watched her submissive, proud hubby approaching her colossal peds. Vegeta crinkled his nose as that cheesy, salty stench returned full force. It was as if she had stuffed her boots with cheesy popcorn.

Finally, he arrived at the wrinkled masses of flesh. Reaching out towards them, he suddenly heard Bulma click her tongue. “No no no, remove those gloves. If you want to prove yourself..you’ll need to get those hands a lil dirty. Besides, it’ll feel better for your queen.”

Vegeta continued to grumble to himself as he reluctantly removed his gloves upon her order. “There, is that better?” He shouts up as he tosses them aside.

“Yup.” Bulma says as she leans in and plucks them off the ground. “And to make sure you don’t try and sneak these back on when I’m not looking.” She says before dropping them into one of her boots.

“H-hey!” Vegeta yells out.

“You’ll get them back once I feel you’ve earned them.” Bulma says sternly. “Now, enough stalling. Get rubbing.”
131131.title: Vegeta!

choices: Bulma Wants Vegeta to WORSHIP Her Stinky Feet!
Bulma Continues to Enjoy Her Rub
1311311.content:
Vegeta mumbled something to himself about his gloves being ruined after being in there for so long before walking up to the first foot and setting his hands on it, cringing as sweat poured out upon his touch and the smell returned. “Damn it, woman! I would’ve figured with all that stuff about feminine appearance that you would take the time to clean yourself.” He shouts as he pinches his nose.

“That’s no way for a man to talk to his wife!” Bulma responds in outrage as she flicks his head with her toe. “I’ve been busy getting that shrink ray ready to go this past couple weeks.”

“Time well spent.” Vegeta says to himself, not wanting to make her more mad as he stands back up and continues to rub.

“Maybe if you were a better husband, this wouldn’t be a problem.” Bulma huffs.

“Wha...why...how is this my fault?!” Vegeta questions, regretting it immediately as he takes another lungful of rotten foot air.

“When was the last time you offered to shower with me, or bathe, or any similar romantic gesture?” Bulma points out. “I would’ve dropped everything to join you, but no, too busy training.” She huffs. “Guess I better add that to the list of things we’re doing together with you like this. Now, keep going!”

Vegeta’s cheeks turned red. “W-well...we’ve had a lot of stuff going on lately!” Vegeta defended as he kept rubbing.

“Oh really? So you’re saying training with Whis and Beerus is more important than me?!” Bulma snaps.

“N-no! Bulma you know that’s not true!” Vegeta cried out. Bulma sighed, enjoying the rub but still frustrated with the Saiyan prince. “I just wish we spent more time together...you could be more affectionate to me!” Bulma pouted.

“F-fine...I’m just not...used to this human affection...thing. Did you forget I’m from a warrior race who had to focus on survival and planet scouring most of the time?” Vegeta huffed.

Bulma frowned, “Never took you as one to make excuses like that…”

“I’m not making excuses!” Vegeta yelled impatiently. “F-fine you want us to spend time together? I’ll take this as a challenge then! I’ll make Kakarot look like a deadbeat!” Vegeta yelled out and began really pushing his hands into her thick soles.

Bulma blushed a bit, moaning slightly at her husband’s touch soothing the aches away from her tired soles. “That’s the spirit…oooh…”

Vegeta smirked a bit at his wife’s reaction to his work as it finally got her off his back a bit. But now this was his challenge to own up to. He swore he would make her happy, and he was damn sure going to follow through as he began to put his back into his work. He also began taking mental notes of what he should keep in mind of once he finally grew back.

One such note was to try and find ways to make sure she cleans her feet. Challenge or no, Vegeta’s nose was still crinkled at the putrid odor coming from his wife’s feet, burning his lungs a bit. If he was going to be doing this both tiny and normal sized, he would need to talk her into getting them cleaned first. But regardless, he didn’t let that stop him from giving his all to rub them.

“Mmmm, so gooood.” Bulma coos. “Now part of me is even more angry you haven’t been doing this sooner. Your hands are magic.”

Vegeta felt a mix of pride and fear at that part. Pride that she was enjoying this so well, but fear at the mention of her still being partly mad. “Hmph, I told you I’d surpass Kakarot as a husband, and I intend to follow through.” He boasts.

“Trust me, just you rubbing my feet is going to be enough to make Chi Chi jealous.” Bulma assures. “But let’s not talk about Goku right now, okay? This is just about you and me. Now, you have my permission to fly higher to reach the higher spots on my feet.”

Vegeta paled at those words. From his time ‘beneath’ her he’d noted that further up her sole was where the stench worsened. However, the prince wasn’t one to do things half-assed...so he reluctantly hovered off the ground and began to move up her arch.

Bulma threw her head back and moaned louder than before. “Mmmm, that’s the spot riiight there.”
1311311.title: Vegeta Gives in and Rubs Those Smelly Feet!

choices: He was being a bit sloppy
13113111.content:
Vegeta continues rubbing his wife’s feet for a while and it was quite a bit of a challenge. But still, he’s doing quite a good job making Bulma feel very pleased of his work. Even though the stench was kicking badly in his nose.

“This is great. You should be proud of yourself, Vegeta.” Bulma teases him a little.

“Yeah. Very.” Vegeta said in sarcasm silently not wanting to piss her off as he was now finished rubbing. “Well, now that your feet are all rubbed up, are you going to unshrink me?”

“Not so fast there, little prince. I’ve got something else I would like you to do now.” Bulma said smirking.

“What is it?” Vegeta asked a bit peeved.

“I want you to start worshipping my feet.” Bulma said making Vegeta pale in shock.

She did NOT really just asked him to worship those smelly feet of hers. It’s one thing to rub them while enduring the bad foot smell. But worshipping them?! He wouldn’t do that even if his life depends on it.

“Are you insane, woman?! You of all people know I wouldn’t do that!” Vegeta shouted to his giant wife.

“Well you don’t seemed to have much of a choice here. Now do you?” Bulma said while Vegeta looks away in embarrassment. “Listen, I’ll tell you what. If you worship my feet and do a fantastic job, I won’t tell a soul about this. Okay?” Bulma suggested.

“Promise?” Vegeta asked still embarrassed.

“I guarantee you on it.” Bulma said.

“F-Fine. I still don’t like this.” Vegeta said floating up Bulma’s foot.

He gulps hard and swallows his pride before he starts worshipping Bulma’s foot by kissing on the skin. This is so humiliating. Vegeta, the proud prince of Sayians, at the size of a bug worshipping a human woman’s foot like a small servant of sorts. Well, at least she agrees to keep her mouth shut if he does a good job.

“Oh. That’s more like it, Vegeta. You know, if someone would’ve told me the mighty Prince Vegeta would worship a human’s feet, I would laugh and tell them no way he would. Guess that’s not the case now.” Bulma said liking what she’s seeing from her mini husband.

“Ain’t that the truth.“ Vegeta thought as he still worships her feet hoping this would at least keep her satisfied.

choices: Krillin Wakes Up In Bed With 18
1322.content:
Krillin had been neglecting 18 lately, or at least that's how his wife felt. Krillin was so busy providing for her financially-wise that he seemed to be forgetting her other needs.

So the sly seductive android had thought up a plan, she'd asked for help from the genius heir of Capsule Corp: Bulma Briefs. The blue haired scientist had not disappointed, she'd provided her blond friend with a powder to sprinkle in Krillin's food. "This'll put him back under your thumb, pun intended!" Bulma had winked at 18.

So the following night, at dinner time, she sprinkled some of the solution onto Krillin's plate of food. Krillin took a bite as he sat down at the table, and suddenly felt rather woozy.

"Something wrong, dear?" 18 asked with a sly smirk. Krillin held his head, "I dunno...the room is spinning...did you get taller?" The bald headed martial artist asked his wife before things went black.

Krillin had passed out mid-shrinking, he was laying unconscious in his seat as 18 chuckled and stood up to stride over to him.

"Now I get what she meant, he really can be under my thumb now." 18 smirked as she reached down and scooped his limp body up into her slender hand.

"I think it's time we rekindle our flame, darling.." 18 whispered seductively as she took him to the bedroom.
1322.title: Android 18's Plan

choices: Krillin somewhat reluctantly accepts the order
He outright refuses, forcing 18 to put her boots back on
He tries to sweet talk his way out of this
13221.content:
18 sat on her bed, looking down at her smaller, unconscious husband in her hands. She had plans for him now that he was this small. Of course, she had no intention to hurt him, just scare him a bit to get some of his attention back to her. To start, she kicked off her boots and laid them before her. She wrinkled her nose a bit at the sour smell coming from them and her feet and wondered if she should've washed them a bit before this.

No, he needed to see what happens when she's neglected, and all the ugly parts that come with them. Even if said parts bordered torture. She dangles his unconscious form over one of her boots before deciding to give a quick kiss to his tiny head. "I love you." She whispers before dropping him in. "But you need to learn a lesson."

*****

Krillin awoke to a stench that made his eyes water. "Aw man, what's that smell?" He questions as he covers where his nose would be and rises to his feet.

That was when he realized that this wasn't the dining room where he passed out. Where was he? With how dark and damp it was, he assumed it was some sort of cave, but the opening into what seemed to be a room told him that it wasn't natural.

However, the opening was soon being covered by a giant, no two, no three, five, five boulders were beginning to block what seemed to be the only exit. He tried to fly out, but his body didn't seem to listen for some reason. He could only watch as his exit was being blocked off by... a giant foot?

Backing up, he sees that, sure enough, what appeared to be a giant female foot was covering the exit to the cave. A little higher up, he saw the unimpressed glare of his android wife staring back at him. "18?! What's happening? How did you get so big?" He questions.

"I'm not big, sweetie. You're just even smaller. I shrunk you so I can get you to pay attention to me for once." She answers.

"18, this is ridiculous. We could've just talked about this. Just grow me back and I'll give you all the attention I have." Krillin begs.

"No chance. You still need to learn your lesson." 18 responds. "When you were your old size your wore yourself ragged at work to the point where you were too tired for me. Now I have it so I'm your whole world."

Krillin backed up, a bit scared by his wife's power fantasy. "Now for your first task, I want you to worship my feet for me. Try and refuse me and I'll put my boots back on with you still inside." She orders. Her boots? Was that where he was right now? He questioned. "By the way, don't even try to fly away. A side effect of what I used to shrink you blocks off your ki, so no energy blasts, and no flight."

Does Krillin accept her order?
13221.title: Krillin Wakes Up in 18's Boot

Krillin tried to force a smile, he was rather renowned as a smooth talker after all. All he had to do was put the schmooze on his beautiful bombshell of a wife. They'd be laughing about this tomorrow he was sure, and he'd have to give Bulma a stern talking to after...since he was guessing that's how 18 got the capabilities to shrink him from.

"Come on 18...do you really want to do this? I mean..I can give you all the foot worship you want at normal size." Krillin said with a wiggle of his eyebrows.

18's face continued to stay stern, but he could tell her eyes were softening. "You never would before..you wouldn't even rub them." She sneered.

"W-well...I'm sorry...I should've been more understanding." Krillin said as 18's face continued to soften. "Let me out of here, and I'll treat you like the queen you deserve to be treated as!" Krillin was laying it on pretty thick and 18 seemed to be flattered as her cheeks were flushing.

However, she gained a confident smirk, "I'll hold you to that...but right now I think you've got something that needs your immediate attention." With that, 18 dumped Krillin out onto the floor of their bedroom, before her slender yet very odorous peds.

"I'm waiting, darling...get to treating me like the queen you know I am." She boomed with a seductive look.

1322132.content:
"So uhhh... what am I supposed to do? I've never exactly worshipped feet before." Krillin says with a hint of nervousness. He wasn't getting away from this even if he somehow got to the world of the kais, she would still find him. Best to just take this like a man.

"Kiss them, lick them, rub them. Do as you please, so long as I am satisfied in the end." 18 instructs, wiggling her toes in anticipation of her husband's treatment.

Seeing no other choice, Krillin put his shaky hands up against her smoothed arch, slipping a bit on the sweat before adjusting. He rubbed his hands along the damp flesh, hoping she even felt him. He got his answer as he heard her coos and moans at his touch. She loved finally getting his full attention and worship.

But Krillin knew he wouldn't be done with just some rubbing. She asked for more and he needed to give more. Not removing his hands, he hesitantly poked out his tongue and gave her foot a few licks. He cringed a bit at the salty taste and the hint of dirt, but didn't find it as atrocious as he feared.

18 twitched a bit as she felt her husband's tongue on her foot. She felt happier and happier at the dedication he's putting into this. She was really looking forward to more of the things she had in store for him. While Krillin was asleep, she called up Bulma for questions about what she put in Krillin.

Turns out the blue powder was just a simple sleep agent. The shrinking part came from tiny nanobots laced into the powder. They entered his body and now gave 18 control of his size via a remote that was sent after she called. With the remote stashed away, she could alter his size as she pleased.

Krillin began to get the hang of licking her foot. Once he got a spot clean enough, he mustered up to courage to plant a kiss on that spot. Again and again he kissed that spot, feeling a bit of pride and relief at his wife's reactions. He then continued this rub, lick, kiss system all along her arch and heel, not being able to reach any higher due to his size. With every new part, he adjusted slightly more to this situation. Maybe this wouldn't be too bad once he gets back to normal.

What happens next?

132312.content: Who else could be shrunk by 18?
132312.title: Someone else

1323121.content:
“Wait--what?!” Krillin yelped as his wife finally revealed to him her plan. 18 gave him a stern look, “You’re off of work for awhile. I’ve even put some money back so you don’t have to worry about us starving and all that. You need to go back to being the tough guy I married.” Android 18 proclaimed with finality.

“I-I’m tough! I just...am out of practice with martial arts and stuff…” Krillin said defensively.

“The man I married would be able to handle getting shot at no problem. It’s not even just that I want you back to being the tough hunk. I worry about you.” 18’s look softened.

Krillin looked rather sad at that. “I...I didn’t know it was weighing so heavily on you…”

“It would put me and Maron at ease, knowing you wouldn’t be at risk of getting shot and killed.” 18 placed a hand on his shoulder.

Krillin sighed, “Fine. What do you have in mind?”

18 smiled, “You heard about Chi-Chi and Bulma reigning their husbands in? They shrank them and it’s like Vegeta and Goku are training their wives at a tiny size. But also Chi-Chi and Bulma are getting those two Saiyans to show them more affection.” 18 said as she reached into their dresser.

“Okay? But what does that have to do with me? I thought I did well by you as a husband?” Krillin questions.

“You have been, almost too much so.” 18 says as she rifles through the drawer to find what she was looking for. “You’ve been working yourself to the bone at work and have barely spent time with me and Marron. As independent as I may seem, I am still a woman at the end of the day, a woman that needs her husband around more to satisfy her needs.”

“1-18?! Is this really the time to talk about that? I always thought I did well.” Krillin says with a defeated tone as he hangs his head a bit in shame.

“No, not that.” 18 corrects. “You always leave me satisfied there.” She says in a seductive tone, making him look up with a bit of pride. “I mean things like foot rubs and joint baths. Whenever you come home from work you flop down too tired to do anything like that for a while.”

“Okay? But why shrink me, then? Like you said, I’ve got time off now, and I don’t need to be small to train or do that kind of stuff with you?” Krillin questions.

“Two reasons. One, according to Bulma, shrinking will inhibit your power, making it so you won’t be able to run off and get out of training. Two, she says that training while shrunk will increase the amount of power gained than training at normal size. Goku and Vegeta are both claiming to have gotten massive power boosts from their time tiny, so you shouldn’t be any different.” She explains as she finally manages to find it. “Ah, here it is.”

“What is it?” Krillin asks as he watches her pull out a hand-size ray gun from their dresser.

“The start of your training.” 18 replies before blasting Krillin with the ray, shrinking him down even further until he was inches tall, causing her to loom over him with a smile on her face. “Now, lets begin.”

Krillin was dazed and wobbled on his feet a bit. The sudden shrinkage gave him a serious sense of vertigo. His wife’s shadow fell over him and he looked up. “E-ehe?” He muttered nervously as he saw how enormous his lovely woman was.

18 grinned smugly, “Well well...looks like you’re smaller than usual now.” She teases.
“Aww, come ooon!” Krillin groaned. She chuckled, “Relax. You act like I’m going to stomp you or something.” Gaining a mischievous glint in her eyes, she starts to raise her right boot over him.
1323121.title: Marriage Counseling the 18 Way

He looked back up and sees 18 stopping her foot from crashing on to him. She then removed her foot from his sight and she looks down at her shrunken husband with a smirk on her face.

“You know what? As much this would be good for training, I would feel kinda bored considering all I’ll be doing is standing acting like I’m trying to step on you. How about we spice things up a bit?” 18 suggested.

“L-Like what e-exactly?” Krillin asked nervous about where this is going.

“Come with me and you’ll find out.” 18 said as she picks Krillin up and brings him to their bedroom.

“And if you win this?” Krillin wondered.

“Then you’ll have to be my tiny little servant until I say you can stop. Sounds like a good deal would you say?” 18 said with that mischievous look.

Krillin gave it a lot of thought before coming up with his answer.

Did Krillin withstood 18?

“And you’re SURE this will help me get Goku and Gohan in line?” Chi-Chi inquired somewhat skeptically as she looked at the blue liquid in the rather innocuous looking bottle. Bulma chuckled, “Trust me...it’s worth a shot right? It’s safe I promise! It’ll let you get a handle on those boys.” Bulma grinned mischievously.

“Sigh...if it works why haven’t you tried to use it for Yamcha?” Chi-Chi inquired, causing Bulma’s eye to twitch.

“UUUUGH! That-that IDIOT! How dare he-” Bulma started ranting and raving about her ex as Chi-Chi sweatdropped. “I’ll uh...see myself out.” Chi-Chi left Capsule Corp with the bottle of strange liquid...leaving Bulma to her ranting and tantruming.

Chi-Chi arrived back to the secluded Son home, frowning as she saw that Goku had taken their son out AGAIN and Gohan’s studies sat abandoned in his room. “That’s...it…” She seethed as she unscrewed the lid to the bottle.

“If he's wanting to make my son a fighting delinquent then I'll make them come back!” She declared angrily as she opened the bottle and downed the substance greedily.

After finishing the bottle she placed it down as she made a mildly disgusted look from the sour after taste of the liquid, then again she supposed that science stuff usually taste bad.

“Alright, so how does this stuff work now?” Chi-Chi asked herself looking over herself in confusion, not feeling much different...until she did feel something incredible.
1331.title: Chi-Chi's Marital Problems

choices: A giant houswife is still a housewife
13311.content:
All at once, Chi-Chi felt a warm sensation all over her body, coming to a center in her stomach. She hunched over onto her knees in discomfort. Her forehead throbbed and her whole body began to ache. Just what the hell did her friend give her?

Her question was answered, unknown to her. With her eyes closed in pain, she failed to notice the room around her growing smaller and smaller, or rather, that she was getting bigger and bigger. As she became too big for the room to hold, she felt a pinching feeling all around her before hearing a loud crash.

The pain began to subside as her growth slowed. She opened her eyes at the sound, unsure to what just happened. To her horror, she saw her son's room reduced to rubble, with her now tree-like legs sprouting out of where it once was. It was then she notify what had actually happened to her. She had grown to a size taller than the treeline.

Bulma's drink did this to her?! She was so surprised by the transformation that she didn't really take the time to question her clothes growing with her. This was terrible. How was she gonna go anywhere if she was big enough to flatten any building she tries to enter?

Then she took a deep breath, thinking about how this was supposed to help her with Goku. With her nerves calmed, she finally took notice of the power spike this new body gave her. It made even the other Z fighters look as weak as she used to be by comparison.

Perhaps that was how this would help. If Goku wanted to train so much that he'd drag Gohan away from his studies, then why not have her give him the perfect training partner? Then maybe she can start roping him in. That can certainly help.

Then again, right now her house was a wreck, by her own doing, no less. Maybe for now she'd be better off putting this new size to use fixing the house. She could even catch dinner, freeing up Goku a little so he can let Gohan study, and maybe get him to sit still long enough to tend to her needs for once.

"You've gotten stronger, Gohan!" Goku praised his son.

An hour or so later they were still fighting, but by now Chi-Chi had rebuilt the Son home into an enormous version of itself so that she could fit inside and do her housework and cook dinner.

She'd yanked a humongous fish from the nearby lake with her bare hand, it was currently roasting on a spit outside. It was partially acting as bait to lure her son and husband back home.

Chi-Chi's feet were sweating and achy in her boots...she could use a foot rub...and since Goku always refused at normal size...complaining about her foot odor...she'd FORCE him to give her one now that she was in charge.

And she LOVED being in charge!

"Hyaa!!" Goku yells out as his fist connected to Gohan's block. "Nice reaction Gohan. I figured I had you with that one."

"Thanks dad. I'm honestly surprised myself. I didn't think I would ever come close to keeping up with you." Gohan admits.

"Well who knows, with enough training like this, you might just surpass me soon. Alright, let's start again. Ready? Let's g... *sniff *sniff. You smell that Gohan?" Goku asks while he sniffs the air.

"Yeah. It smells delicious." Gohan replies, sniffing with him. "It's coming from home. Race 'ya there." He says, getting a head start.

"Hey, no fair." Goku says, taking off after his son.

*****

The two arrived to see not the small stone cottage they left behind, but a much larger version of it that put the Ox King's castle to shame in terms of size. "Woah, is this really our house dad?" Gohan asks.

"I dunno. What I do know is that this is where that smell is coming from. Let's check it out." Goku answers as he opens a smaller door within the now giant front door.

As the two enter, they are greeted by two things. The first was the source of the smell, a fish ten times even Goku's size. The other, was their wife and mother Chi-Chi, now tall enough to level the forest with just a morning walk.

"Chi-Chi?! What happened to you? How did you get so big?" Goku asked.

"Never mind that." Chi-Chi booms down to them. "Dinner's ready. Gohan sweetie, you can go ahead and dig in, eat as much as you want."

At his mother's permission, Gohan flew over to the fish and starts to eat. Goku starts to follow, only for his path to be blocked by Chi-Chi's booted foot. "As for you Goku, my feet are killing me from rebuild this house from scratch as well as catching and cooking dinner."

She lifts up her foot, reaching for her boot. She begins to pull at it, only for it to be quite attached. She grunted and groaned as she pulled at it, making sure her other foot still kept Goku from his meal. Finally, the boot popped off her foot, releasing a cloud of sweaty steam. The sole itself had a slight pink tint to it from how hard she'd worked today. Her toes were slender and elegant, with purple nail polish at the tips. The entire thing was so saturated with sweat that it was dripping off her toes like a small shower. There was still steam emenating from the foot itself. It was certainly a sight to see for the smaller fighter. Then the smell hit Goku's nose, it was horrible. Goku put his hands over his nose, which got Chi-Chi's attention as she took her attention away from removing her other boot. "So before you get to eat, you have to rub them for me. Otherwise, you can cook your own dinner." Goku winces at the idea. He didn't want to put up with her foot odor when she was normal size. Like this, it would be way too much. "Clock's ticking Goku, you don't want Gohan to eat it all himself, do you? You know how big his appetite is."

"It went better than I or you could've ever imagined! Our marriage feels like it has found new life!" Chi-Chi excitedly informed her friend.

Landing the yellow plane and cutting the engine, Bulma marveled at how the house looked the same but was now HUGE.

"Hi! I guess that stuff I gave you worked better than expected!" Bulma said, rather intimidated and feeling pretty insignificant.

Chi-Chi just nodded and reached down, Bulma was startled as the hand enveloped her and brought her up into the house.

On the coffee table was a coffee mug so big Bulma could swim in it..not that she'd want to seeing as it's steaming hot. Next to it was a miniscule 'normal' sized mug which the giantess delicately handed to Chi-Chi.

The dark haired housewife was surprisingly gentle and able to restrain herself even as a giant it seemed. Bulma took the coffee mug and looked around in amazement. "You did all this in an HOUR?" Bulma's jaw was dropped.
