You stretch your arms as you sit down on the couch after a long day at school. It wasn't bad or anything, just really long and boring. You just want to relax with a little t.v. Just as you are about to click it on, however, there's a knock at your front door. "Who could that be?" You ask to yourself as you get up to answer it.

"Who's there?" You say as you open the door. On the other side you see Mandy, a girl from your school. You remember her giving you some weird looks, but you usually shrugged it off. You know of her reputable of being a brat, so you question why she was here. It's not like you were anything special.

"Mandy? What are you doi..." You start before you are cut off by something hitting you in the chest. The world around you quickly grows. You soon realize what that means, you were shrinking. Finally you stop shrinking ar about a foot tall.

You look up at the now giant raven-haired beauty to see that she's holding some sort of gun. Pointed at where you were just standing. Did she do this? "What the hell?!" You shout up to her.

"Ah ah ah. That's no way for you to address your new girlfriend, or shouldn't I say, goddess." She replies. Before you could respond or even comprehend her words, she reaches down and grabs you before tossing you in a tiny compartment in her purse before leaving your house.

Where does she take you?
1442.title: Mandy is Your New Goddess

choices: The Floor Underneath Him Shakes, It's his BIG Cousin Coming For Him!

1451.content:
"Ugh! I've HAD it with that little twerp!" Clover stormed into her house, followed by Alex and Sam. A new Diminutive Smalls plot had been foiled....despite Norman trailing along and annoying Clover throughout the entire trip.

Clover's cousin had recently discovered the trio's secret, and of course he used it to his advantage. Threatening to 'tell on them' if they didn't buy him ice cream, if they didn't take him along, if they didn't buy him some videogames.

Now the spies had to store the Shrink Ray in a secure place...despite Norman's protests. "Aww come ooon! I wanna play with it!" The blond brat whined.

"It's NOT a toy, Normie." Sam sighed.

"But, but...Clover got to be a giant!" Norman pointed at Clover accusingly.

"GiantESS." Alex corrected him.

"And it wasn't like I CHOSE to get all super huge!" Clover protested.

"No fair! I wanna be a giant!" Norman reached for the ray, but Clover held it out of his reach. The boy wasn't giving up however, and quickly tried to leap for it.

"Enough!" Sam shouted authoritatively, causing everyone to freeze. The shrink ray STAYS in our custody...until we can contact WOOHP and get it put away to a secure location." Sam explained sternly.

"Awww! You're going to just give it away?" Alex complained, getting a stern look from Sam and making a squeak noise as she shut up.

Sam massaged her forehead, "Clover, make sure to keep that thing safe and out of grabby hands."

Clover nodded and shoved Norman away, "You got it."

Sam nodded, "I'm going to get out of these stuffy spy gear and take a hot bath." Sam departed for the other room. Norman stomped off to play videogames, pouting.

"Sheesh, your cousin sure is a handful. It'd be nice if he weren't such a big pain." Alex didn't know it, but those words sparked a devious idea in Clover's head.

"Yeaaah....I wish he was cut down to size." Clover's devious grin was unsettling Alex. "Uhhh..yeah..I'm gonna go grab a snack." Alex dashed out of the room, to Clover's kitchen to raid her fridge.

Clover peered around the corner to see her dorky cousin reclined on the sofa, a look of pure focus on his face as he played his game.

"Oooh Nooormiiie~! Can you come here for a second?" Clover called into the room. Norman glared over his shoulder at her, "What do YOU want?"

"Oh well with that attitude, I guess I'll just eat this ice cream myseeelf~!"

Norman's eyes widened in excitement, he made a mad dash into Clover's room....only to be captured in a bright green light...and everything start to look much bigger.

Normie cringed and clutched his nose, Clover reached under her bed and produced her red boots, they were emitting steam and foot odor in fumes.

Shuddering at the damp smell of the dank cave of his cousin's boot, he regretfully walked inside. The second his foot stepped on the inside, he heard an audible squelch before sinking slightly.

If the damp, sweatiness of the air wasn't bad enough, it also smelled like something just died in there. He continued walking, tripping over himself in the moist fabric he was forced to walk on. Finally, he reached a long, horizontal wall, which even he could tell was the sole of the boot. Taking a big swallow of his child pride, he stuck his tongue out and began to lick.

Only to almost immediately throw up at the salty taste. This was nasty, he almond pitied whoever had to clean these when she wasn't focing him to do it. But, he needed to pick up the pace. He had to clean all inside this boot and it's partner, so he resumed licking.

Outside, Clover was laughing her butt off. Aftrr all these years, she finally got to put that twerp in his rightful place, as nothing more than her slave. She could already imagine some of the things she would do to torture him.

15112.content: Who does she find so small?
15112.title: Gwen finds a tiny

151121.content:
It had been a scorching few days in the Rustbucket with the RV's air conditioner out. Needless to say, Gwen's gross cousin Ben was smelling worse than usual. This led to Ben performing several gross 'pranks' on Gwen that she didn't find at all funny.

Last night he'd put his stinky week old socks inside her pillowcase without telling her! She was smelling his feet all night and even when she removed them...her pillow still stunk! So now, Gwen was sitting on her bed, looking through her book of spells to find the perfect way to get back at him!

"Hm....this one looks good." Gwen whispered to herself, taking a closer look. The page read that it was a Shrinking Spell that would not only shrink the victim down to a desired height, but would make them uncrushable!

"Hehehehe....this sounds perfect! Time to take that dork down a notch." Gwen smirked deviously as she wiggled her toes within her white slip ons. Gwen's toes made squelching sounds within her shoes, she was going without socks since it was so very hot these days.

Closing the book, the ginger haired girl quietly got out of bed. Hearing her dweeb cousin snoring in his bedroom, she tiptoed inside and cringed. Ben's room was a mess of old dirty clothes and junk food wrappers.

"Jeez, I knew he was a slob...but come on.." Gwen muttered to herself as she continued moving towards Ben's sleeping form.

How small does she make him?
151121.title: Gwen's Revenge

choices: She removes her shoes and demands a foot massage
She drops him in one of her unwashed socks
1511211.content:
Gwen didn't want him to get too small. Otherwise he might slip away without her seeing. Plus, with him the size of a doll, there were so many more possibilities to mess with him. Clutching the spellbook in her hand, she began to recite the shrinking spell verbatim.

Ben was mostly asleep when he heard his cousin's voice. He snaps awake, however, when he feels his body begin to shrink. His bed quickly became the size of a city block. He was freaking out. The world looked like it did whenever he went Grey Matter, only he was still human.

Then he saw the his cousin Gwen standing over him with a smug grin on her face. "Gwen? What's going on? What happened to me?" He asks in a panic.

"Isn't it obvious doofus? I shrunk you with a spell." She admits without remorse, holding up the book for emphasis.

"What?! Why?" He asks, starting to get angry.

"Payback for that little prank of yours the other day where you put your socks in my pillow. Now you're gonna be my little plaything until you learned your lesson." She tells him.

"Oh yeah? Well we'll see about that. It's hero ti..." He starts as he starts up his watch.

"I wouldn't if I were you. If you change, you'll still be tiny. Even Way Big might not get you back up to my size. Plus, even if you did somehow get away, I'm the only one with the spell to grow you back, so you'll be coming back to me sooner or later." She points out.

Now Ben might not be bright, but even he could tell that she was right. Turning off the Omnitrix, he slumped over in defeat. "Fine, what do you want to do to me?" He asks.

"Glad you asked loser, because I was thinking..."
1511211.title: 5 Inch Dweeb

15112112.content:
Without warning, Gwen's enormous hand scooped up Ben and enclosed him in a fist. Ben struggled and squirmed as Gwen carried him back to her room. She sat down on her bed and held Ben before her smug face.

Ben began to get impatient, "Well? Get it over with!" Ben huffed, only to make a funny squeak as Gwen gripped him tightly. "Oh? Is the tiny dweeb giving me lip?" Gwen narrowed her eyes menacingly.

Reaching down with her other hand, she brought up a blue and clearly unwashed (judging from the smell) sock from beneath her bed. "Since you're such a big fan of stinky socks, you can experience mine!" Gwen declared.

Ben groaned, his cousin might not usually enjoy his gross antics, but from the whiffs he was getting...her feet were potent! "Since it's been so hot, I've not been taking my hot baths...and in preparing for my revenge I've left these week old socks under my bed! I've avoided washing them just to let them stew and fester and get reaaally gross." Gwen snickered before taking a small whiff of the sock.

She cringed and made a 'blehgh!' sound as she wrinkled her nose. "Hehe, sucks to be you dork." Holding the sock open with her fingers, she held Ben over it.

Ben thought they stunk from afar, but the waft that came up out from its depths made his face turn green! "Uuugh! I can't believe this!" Ben roared as Gwen released him and he plummeted down inside.

He landed with a sickening PLOP! Right down in the very squishy and rancid toe end.
15112112.title: Not Hero Time..It's Sock Time!

choices: She goes for a long summer's walk to sweat up her shoes
She checks her spellbook for something helpful
151121121.content:
"Hope you don't mind, but I'm gonna leave you in there while I go do some things, 'kay?" Gwen teased. After all, it wasn't like he had a say in the matter. "But before I go, I wanna make sure you don't skip out on your punishment."

While Ben was still spinning from the cheesy odor inside the sock, Gwen reached back under her bed to pull out the partner sock to the one holding Ben. She sniffed this one just like before and even her eyes began to water. "Whew, that one's ripe. Hate to be you dweeb, because I wore these for about a week straight before I stuffed them under my bed like this." She taunts.

With this sock, Gwen took the one Ben was in and rolled up the opening a tad before stuffing it into it's counterpart. Soon, the sock Ben was in was completely wrapped in the other, with the only exit now blocked by the toe section of the other sock. This meant he was trapped in a ball of his cousin's used socks.

It wasn't like his prison was airtight, however. Gwen wanted him miserable, not dead. But the air he was getting was so full of her sweaty, vinegry foot smell that he'd wish he would pass out. "Breathe deep doofus. You're gonna be in there for a while." Gwen says before putting the wad on her bed and heading out.

Inside the ball, Ben was in hell. Every possible movement required air, forcing him to inhale more of her eye-watering foot odor, and all he got out of it was a squelching noise, followed by more of her nasty sweat soaking into him. Laying still wasn't much better, though, since it meant he was now stewing in the sweat that already came out. For once, he hoped Gwen came back soon.

Meanwhile, Gwen was busy thinking up how to make things even worse for him when she finally let him out. Question was... how?
151121121.title: Gwen Leaves Him In There!

"Listen up dweeb, I'm going out on a walk. I'm going to sweat up my feet real good for your dorky nose. So when I get back, you're going to experience the real deal!" Gwen boomed down to the squirming lump in her balled up socks.

Ben couldn't believe this, this was totally humiliating. He'd get his cousin back for this when....IF he got back to normal! It made him worried that Gwen might NOT turn him back to normal..but he tried to shove those thoughts aside.

He heard the thooming footsteps of his nerdy cousin retreating to the front of the RV, it was late at night but still quite hot and sticky out. Gwen would have no problem working up a sweat in those white slip-ons.

Gwen stepped out into the humid and muggy air and sighed as she wiggled her moist toes in her shoes. She grinned wickedly and broke out into a brisk jog.

After about a half hour Ben actually started to worry despite his situation. Gwen didn't usually go out at night...what if she got mugged or something?

These feelings evaporated when he heard the screen door open and quietly close..and booming footsteps approaching.

"Whew! You're reaaally in for it dweeb! My feet are soaked!" Gwen announced as she entered the room once more.

Gwen undoes her trap for her cousin and pulls him out, setting him on the floor at her shoes. "Come on Gwen, this isn't funny anymore. Just grow me back and we can forget this ever happened. I'll even start being nicer to you." Ben begged, not wanting to be subjected to even more foot torture.

"Not a chance dweeb. You need to learn your lesson completely before I even consider regrowing you. Now then, let's get started." She says with a smirk before reaching for her shoe.

Wonder Woman had just arrived back home to her remote safehouse after a long day of working up a sweat fighting villains. Today had been an exceptionally hot day and Wonder Woman was beat. Thankfully, there were no world-ending threats lately...so that left her a bit of time to relax.

The safehouse was located in Washington, DC. Her base of operations was now that area due to being unable to come and go between Themyscira and the world of man. There were a few exceptions, but those weren't common.

It was more of a bunker provided to her by the U.S. government so they could call upon her when needed. Steve Trevor sometimes visited, but he was busy on his own duties.

However, upon arriving at the hidden doorway, she knew something was amiss. The keypad on the wall could only be accessed by scanning her thumb-print...but it had clearly been tampered with.

It almost appeared as though someone had with great precision, rewired it. A panel was loose on the side, definitely the work of an expert.

Quickly and quietly she slipped inside and turned on the lights. Everything appeared to be in order....but that just meant whoever was in here was hiding!

Behind a picture frame holding a photograph of Steve Trevor and Diana together...there was a very minuscule villain.

The villain's codename was Inch-Worm, and he utilized shrinking technology based on those used by The Atom. He had been hired by Amanda Waller to gain intel for leverage against Wonder Woman.

Unfortunately, when he was rewiring the locking mechanism outside the door, it fried his size tech!

So now here he was, stranded inside the notoriously brutal amazon princess' safehouse...at a helpless size..and he STILL needed to retrieve the leverage!

choices: Nami Spots a 'Bug'...And Realizes She's Being Spied On! (Aware)
1553331123.content:
https://i.imgur.com/KL3GgCG.jpg

The red headed thief and navigational genius Nami had smooth talked and seduced her way into a pirate crew. She schmoozed them with her boasting of her navigating skills and even showed them glimpses of her amazingly detailed sea charts. She currently was waiting on the dumb and incredibly drunk crew to go to sleep....that way she could sneak around the ship and steal whatever she desired!

This was how Nami had been doing business for some time now. Pretend she was interested in joining some hapless losers' crew...then rob them blind once they'd lowered their guard.

She lay in her modest quarters on the mattress, reading over a book of legendary treasures. Her eyes made $$ signs and she practically drooled at the sight of the artist depictions of hoards.

"OOoooohohoho! I'd kill to get my hands on that much swag." She hugged the book to her chest and lost herself to fantasies of wealth and riches.

"And once these losers are all passed out...they'll wake up to find their recent haul has fallen riiight into my pockets! Heehehehe!" Nami boasted to herself.

Unfortunately...maybe....for Nami there was a Devil Fruit user in this crew.

What is a Devil Fruit you may ask? They are legendary fruits that taste awful and come in a variety of colors and shapes.

The taste notwithstanding, these fruits upon ingestion grant a person extraordinary powers that are as varied as the shapes and colors of the fruits themselves.

The fruits however, permanently take away a sailor's ability to swim in any body of water be it the sea or a lake. No two devil fruits are the same, there is only one of each and only one who possesses each power.

Nami had heard rumors that there was a Devil Fruit user in this dopey crew. But she'd either yet to see him or the person was keeping their power well hidden.

"Devil Fruit users are pretty dangerous, so I should keep my guard up. It might be the captain..or any of them." Nami sighed, these conquests of hers always had to have some catch didn't they?

Nami was not alone in her quarters however, the very Devil Fruit user who she'd just remembered...had hid away in her room. She didn't see him because he didn't want her to...yet.

On the wall across from her meager bed, was what appeared to be a common fly. However, if one were to look closer...they'd see it was actually a tiny man in a fly costume. The Devil Fruit user Buzzy! Buzzy had had a bad feeling about this girl from the start, and even though the captain and the crew had the hots for her...Buzzy was no fool!

"Bzz bzz! I knew it! This broad is a crook! I'd better report back to the captain!" Buzzy er...buzzed.

Buzzy was almost fanatically loyal to the captain and the crew. Even though they trampled him all the time, and mocked him and such..he still felt like he had a home here. Unfortunately for him, that loyalty shall cost him...and despite his die hard loyalty...if he were to say...be squashed by a certain red haired pirate?

It was doubtful the crew would care, but Buzzy couldn't be persuaded or convinced that to them he was just a mild amusement...or a toy. And unluckily...Buzzy might find himself wishing he'd picked another crew of gone it alone, depending where his extreme loyalty has him end up that is.

Nami yawned and stretched, tossing the book aside, she began to stand up...towering over the 'fly' on the wall.

"I should check to see if the losers are out yet...I mean...I DID spike their drinks after all!" Nami sniggered as she walked across the room to the door.
1553331123.title: Swindled by a Thief...Who'd Have Guessed?

15533312.content: Is Robin a giantess or are others shrunk around her?
15533312.title: Nico Robin

155333122.content:
It was another peaceful day in the new world. Which wasn’t exactly the norm but it was the new world so normal was relative. The Straw Hat Pirates had arrived at a mysterious island that wasn’t on any map.

The entire crew minus their resident swordsman left the thousand sunny and began to explore the island. It was a typical cliche jungle set up, a vast plain of green trees thst stretched for a while before rising up to a few towering mountains. On these mountains were the ruins of an ancient civilization.

The crew split up into pairs and set off on their exploration. Captain Luffy was the first to leave as he headed off in a hurry with Chopper clinging to his back screaming all the way. Franky and usopp were the next to leave as they were hoping to come across some new or rare materials that they could use to improve the sunny.

Sanji and Brook took off as well looking for any food they could find. Sanji would’ve preferred one of the beautiful ladies of the crew to join him, however he knew that hinting for food was no job for a lady so he brought along their skeleton musician Brook, at the very least he could enjoy some lovely songs as they hunted. That left the women of the crew, Nami the gorgeous red headed navigator and Robin the beautiful raven haired archeologist.

Robin was very interested in exploring the ruins a top the mountains, Nami had agreeed to tag along but mainly because he was hoping to find some treasure up there. So they packed up some supplies and headed off on their adventure.

2 hours later

The ladies had been hiking for a couple of hours now and we’re nearing their destination. Sufficient to say the journey was taking its toll on poor nami who was sweating buckets and panting exhaustedly.

“Are...are we there yet?”

“Almost Nami it’s just over his peak here, look!” Robin answered excitedly.

True to her word they reached the top of the hill and stood staring st the magnificent ruins before them. They looked like an ancient castle, there were several pillars either side of the single entrance which was a assume opening in the middle of the brown crumbling ruin.

Robins eyes lit up like a Christmas tree, without saying a word she made her way over to the entrance of the ruins and began examining all of the columns and pillars as a Nami collapsed onto a nearby wall, kickin off her sandals and taking a massive swig of her water bottle.

“Oh my god, that took forever! Man there better be some food treasure here my feet are exhausted!” Nami exclaimed.

Robin was only half listening to her friend as she continued to examine all of the ruins outside of the entrance. After several minutes she was done outside and prepared herself to enter the ruins.

“Coming Nami?”

“Yeah Yeah give me a second”

Nami walked over to Robin and the two entered the ruins. It was near pitch black inside, luckily robin found a torch nearby and lit it so she could illuminate their surroundings. No sooner had the light lit up did the release what was inside the ruin.

Nami screamed and latched onto Robin with all her might as the archeologist remains rather indifferent. Before them was what appeared to be a skeleton but it wasn’t a normal Skeleton, no this one had to be 50ft tall!

“Wow a giant skeleton. This island might’ve been the giants homeland before Elbaf! Nami we might’ve just made the archeological find of the century!”

“Yeah yeah that’s nice and all but can we get out of here please? There’s no treasure and that thing is creeping me out!”

Robin smiled and patted a Nami on the head as she stepped forward to examine the Skeleton. It was an odd Skeleton to say the least. It was a giant skeleton but it didn’t appear to be a skeleton of a giant. No it seemed like it was a normal Skeleton that had grown somehow! How was this possible?

As much as she wanted to examine her find more, Nami was becoming more and more unsettled, so calling it a day Robin prepared to leave. However at out of the corner of her eye she saw something underneath the Skeletons little toe. Using her devil fruit powers Robin unearthed the object from the skeleton and brought it to herself so she could see what it was.

“Hmm What is this? It looks like a necklace?”

In a heartbeat Nami was right by Robin with money signs in her eyes as she stared at the necklace in her grasp.

“Did you find treasure? How much is it worth? Man this trip wasn’t s waste after all!” Nami exclaimed.

However to her disappointment she saw thst the necklace was brown and crusty and looked like it would fall to pieces at any second.

Frustrated Nami stormed off to the entrance as Robin giggled at her misfortune. However just as she was about to follow suit the necklace in her hand began to glow!

“Beware all those that find this necklace. Leave it and life will continue as normal. Take it and things will change in a BIG way.”

The voice was gone as quickly as it came. Robin was shocked, what was that voice? What was that warning? What did it mean by Big way? Before she could think properly she was interupted by Nami calling to her to hurry up. Without thinking she casually dropped the necklace into her pocket and followed the navigator out of the ruin.

That night at the Sunny

After an eventful day the crew were all together again. They had each and their own grand adventure that was too grand to be put into words. After a hearty dinner robin headed back to the room that she and Nami shared. Sitting on her bed she felt something in her back pocket. Reaching a hand in she pulled out the necklace she had found earlier, except now it was solid gold!

Totally perplexed Robin stared at it for a good minute before her feminine side kicked in and she had the urge to try it on. Heading to the mirror she admired herself in it. That’s when the door to her room opened and Nami walked in.

Robin turned to face her but then out of nowhere the necklace lit up and a bright light engulfed the entire ship! Robin shielded her eyes as Nami and a few other scaredy-cats in the crew screamed at the light.

After a few seconds the light went away and Nami regained her composure.

“What the hell was that? Robin are you...” Nami started.

The navigator then stopped dead on her tracks as she found herself not looking into robins eyes but at her belly button!!!

Craning we neck up she was shocked to see Robin towering over her with a surprised look on her face!

“Ahhhhh robin what happened to you! You’ve grown to like double your size!!!”

“Erm no Nami I’m normal size... I think it’s you that’s changed size...” Robin answered.

Nami spun around and found that her crewmate was right! She had lost nearly half her height was now a measly 3”5 tall! There were chairs that were taller than her in the room!

“Robin what happened! Why did I shrink and you stayed the same?” Nami said slightly panicked.

Robin however ignored her and headed for the door.

“Wait where are you going? You gotta help me!” Nami yelled.

“I will Nami bit I’m worried about the rest of our crew, that light shone right through the walls so I’d guess that there’s a chance that everyone else has shrunken as well!”

Robin then opened her door as the child sized nami ran after her.

“Don’t leave me here then I’ll be safer with you!”

With that the duo went to check in the rest of her crew. They found that the guys were...

"So lemme get this straight, you want ME to help YOU rebuild the walls of Ba Sing Se?" Toph stood there and raised an eyebrow, looking at the construction crews skeptically.

The crewmen nodded with wide smiles.

"And WHY should I be doing YOUR job?" She put her hands on her hips and sneered at the construction workers.

The crews went into a huddle and murmured among themselves, leaving Toph standing there in the hot sun as her feet sweat onto the ground in moist prints.

"Well?!" She yelled grumpily, it was hot out here and she didn't wanna be standing around all day! The group broke their huddle and turned to the girl.

"W-well, we can't really pay you-" The 'boss' said.

Toph immediately turned and waved her hand, "See ya!"

"W-wait! Please! We need your help!" The crewmen begged pathetically. Toph sighed, "Alright, alright...since you're being SOOO pathetic and grovelling to me is appreciated."

"Great! Just drink this!" The foreman handed her a vial of some kind of strange blue liquid. "What's this? Some kinda energy drink?"

"It'll make you stronger and able to get the job done more efficiently!" The foreman said.

Toph scowled, "You doubting my abilities?"

"N-No! Of course not!" The foreman nervously chuckled, knowing of Toph's heroics and her penchant for sending people flying with her earthbending. Toph hmphed and gave a subtle kick at the ground with her heel, an earth pillar sent the yelling foreman flying into the air.

Toph gulped down the liquid...

They were lucky they did when they had, as she was beginning to grow to the point where her earth-covered toes were overtop where they stood. Soon, the whole construction site was collapsing around the still-growing earthbender as she began to grow even taller than the Earth King's palace.

Finally, she stopped at around fifty feet tall, about as high as the wall used to be. Toph looked over her new size in awe. "Woah." Now back to work, all of you." She barks as the ones building her footstool resumed with newfound energy.

What happens next?
15533331211111121.title: Nope! She Swallows Him Whole!

choices: They Obey and Toph Enjoys Her Pampering
155333312111111212.content:
Toph sensed some of the tiny people acting as her current human foot stool beneath her heels. They were getting tired, she couldn't blame them, her feet were quite large even at normal size.

They'd been holding them up for quite some time during all of this, and Toph couldn't help but feel the need for some..pampering.

Lifting her heels off of the 'human foot stool' crowd, she planted them with their soles facing the group, directly behind them. "Alright, here's the deal. You get a break from being my temp foot stool."

There was a collective sigh of relief and Toph sensed them starting to relax. The gigantic Earthbender smirked as she dashed those hopes with her next words. "You're gonna pamper my lovely feet instead! As you can see and most likely smell...they're in need of some attention." Toph said smugly as she wiggled her pudgy toes.

The tiny group paled at the thought of getting up close and personal with those dirty and frankly smelly soles and toes. Toph could sense their distaste and chuckled, "Yeah, but it ain't like you've got a choice runts! What I say goes!" She leaned forward in her throne with a devious grin.

On cue, her stomach let out a gurgle, reminding everyone just what had occurred moments prior.

"H-how are we supposed to-" One of the crew began to ask..only to be interrupted by the queen.

"Duh! You've got tongues don't you? Maybe put em' to use at licking these feet instead of yapping!" Toph relaxed back arrogantly.
155333312111111212.title: Toph's Foot Treatment

choices: As time goes on, Toph's feet are clean, like a "true queen's"
The men start to slow down, time for another example
1553333121111112122.content:
The poor workers had no desire to get within ten miles of those feet, much less get right up next to them for "pampering". But, the example set by their former foreman reminded them what would happen if they displeased her. And with her size and earthbending skills, she could catch them before they even got twenty feet away.

They shakily approach the two meaty walls and begin to lick the dirt off her feet. They wanted to spit at the mixed taste of dirt and salty sweat, but decided against it to avoid angering their "queen". The men lap away at the heels of her feet desperately, fighting through the taste and smell just to keep her happy.

Soon, the heels of her feet were spotless and the men stopped. "Hey, what's going on down there? I don't feel clean feet." Toph booms.

"My queen, it's impossible for us to go any higher. Your feet are simply too much taller than us." One of them plead.

Toph wanted to snap back with something, but had to conceed his point. These lot weren't even earthbenders, after all. "Fine, I'll give you some help." She relents. With a tap of a finger on her throne, a wide platform rose by her feet, raising the crew up to the next dirty part of her foot. "Now back to work." She orders before laughing as she feelings their tongues return.

What happens next?
1553333121111112122.title: They Obey and Toph Enjoys Her Pampering

choices: Toph Decides to Go For a Walk Through Town with Her Reeking Feet
15533331211111121221.content:
Soon they were lapping away at the thick arches, those pudgy toes above wiggled pleasantly as Toph hummed in pleasure. Unfortunately, this fanned down the noxious aroma of her toe jam down at them, causing a chorus of gagging.
Thankfully Toph found their disgust to be amusing as all heck. "Hahaha! What's wrong, worms? Don't like the smell of your Queen?"

Toph grinned deviously, "Trust me, it's better to be dealing with this than what your former boss is going through." She patted her stomach as gurgling came from within. The crowd of construction workers shuddered, they did NOT wanna picture that.

The mental image of their boss being digested alive was bad enough, but once they moved up to the balls of Toph's gargantuan feet...the stink became unbearable. Some of the poor saps even felt bile rising up their throats from the horrendous foot odor of their queen.

Toph didn't seem to notice, or if she did she just relished in her power and their torment. Finally, the bottoms of Toph's wide feet were clean...now was time for the worst part.

"Hmm...ya dorks did alright I guess. But I've got loads 'a jam still in these toes! So get to it! EAT!" Toph bellowed with an obnoxious laugh.

The group at first thought she was joking. But upon stalling, they found the earth platform launching upwards. The platform became like a slide...ending directly to deposit them in Toph's grimy toe gaps!

With a sickening landing akin to falling in a swamp..the group groaned as they were now between the rows of stinky pillars.

"Now start licking before I turn ya into MORE jam for these bad boys!" Her voice boomed as the giant toes wiggled threateningly.

Soon enough, the toes were cleaned and the poor men had bellies full of enough sweat and foot dirt to last them a lifetime.

Toph sighed in relaxation as she brought her feet up to her face. Feeling on her now softened and supple soles with her fingers, she gave a hearty sniff of the foot.
"Mmm...they still stink...but less like dirt and more like your giant queen's natural foot funk." Toph declared proudly as she dumped the men out of her toes roughly.

"I SUPPOSE you did good enough..." Toph sighed. "Go take a break or whatever..." She shoo'd them away.
15533331211111121221.title: A Queen's Feet

choices: Her workers finally finish her stool
Toph demands tribute from the people
Her new worshippers approach her throne
155333312111111212212.content:
Toph's had more than enough of sitting around at this construction site, no matter how fun pushing these runts around was. She needed to stretch her legs and walk for a bit. Standing up from her throne, she got the immediate attention of her subjects. They all feared what her standing up meant for them.

"Don't stop working, you lot. I want that footstool finished already." She barks. "I'm going for a walk. Don't try to leave or I'll sense it from miles away."

"M-my queen, what should we do if we finish the stool before you return?" One of the builders asks fearfully.

"Hmmm... Bring it to... the palace. That's where you'll find me." She tells them before stomping off. "And remember, no running, or else." The workers gulp before quickly returning to their work.

Meanwhile, Toph was making her way towards the city of Ba Sing Se. The citizens began to cower and attempt to flee the city at the sight of her approach. Toph could sense their escape attempts and smirked as she remembered that she was still hired to build the city's walls, and that included the inner walls around the city itself. With a mighty stomp, another set of fifty foot walls erupt around the main city, trapping everyone inside.

She stomped her way through the city, demolishing several houses along the way. Soon, those not running to avoid getting stomped on were instead running to avoid her... emissions. Sweat drops fell from her body and created large, salty puddles where they landed. Her foot odor filled the air where they stepped down. She even wiggled her chubby toes to waft more of her stench inti the air and splatter more sweat in the citizens.

The people below her covered their noses to block out the stale odor as best they could. As they ran, there were some poor souls that ended up getting a direct hit from some of her sweat drops, soaking them head to toe in the salty fluid. But to even Toph's surprise, she saw some people bowing as she passed, as if already submitting themselves to her. Sweet.

Any home or business unfortunate enough to be in her way were crushed under her bare feet. "Out of the way weaklings. Your queen is coming through." She booms throughout the city as she makes her way to the palace. Finally, she arrived at the seat of the Earth King's power. With a tap of her finger on the doors, they shatter like twigs. In the hole left by the now-destroyed doors, now stood a frightened Earth King and his pet bear.

"Toph? Is that you?" He asks as he recognizes her efforts from the war. "What is the meaning of this?"

"Clear out Earth King. I'm the Queen of the Earth Kingdom now. I'm big enough and strong enough to crush anyone that gets in my way, even you." She threatens.

"C-can I at least keep Bosco?" He trembles.

Toph pinches the brim of her nose. "Sure, you can keep the dumb bear." She tells him. "Now SCRAM!!!"

At her yell, the now former Earth King mounted his bear friend and fled the palace stairs. With that done, Toph takes the chance to smash the palace and any unfortunate enough to still be inside before rebuilding her stone throne from outside atop the rubble. She sits on this new throne, overlooking her destruction and the land she now owned. "Ahhh. It's good to be queen." She moans as she stretches out.

What happens next?
155333312111111212212.title: A Queen Needs A Palace

choices: Skip to the Palace Being Built Around Her
Toph Demands a Nice Foot Rub!
1553333121111112122121.content:
"Your highness!" A group of voices catch the relaxing queen's attention. She can sense it, a large group carrying what she can tell is her footstool. "About darn time, ya slowpokes!" She booms as she wiggles her pudgy toes at the group, snickering as she hears many sounds of gagging.

"Now..let's test this bad boy out!" Toph hoisted her feet up into the air so they hovered above. The group starts to panic, but Toph quickly makes sure any ideas about letting go of the giant item leave their heads. "You drop that thing, I'll use YOU jerks as replacements!"

No one argued, even though they were pretty sure the thing was quite sturdy. She plopped her feet, soles down, onto the plush cushion adorning the top of her brand new foot stool. "Hmmm..." The giantess hums in thought as she grinds her feet into the cushion. Toph kneads the plush with her toes and those holding the thing swear they hear those digits make sickening squelches above.

"Seems soft enough, I'll have this thing smellin' like good ol' Queen Toph feet in no time!" Toph grins cheekily. "Alright, leave it there..and I expect you dorks to salvage this dungheap of a castle into something more...my size."

"Yes, Queen Toph!" The group choruses.

Toph licked her lips, "Queen Toph...I like the way that sounds. Address me like that from now on, ya hear?!" Toph barks.
1553333121111112122121.title: A Footstool At Last

choices: Toph orders a temple be built for people to worship her feet
15533331211111121221211.content:
Days turned into weeks after Queen Toph overthrew the Earth King and declared herself ruler of Ba Sing Se. The men building her new palace had to throw together new materials to build it, as there simply wasn't enough from the remains of the old palace to build it.

As the palace was being built, though, Toph got to work addressing her rule. She told them that she held absolute authority in the city, and that any disobedience of her orders would be met with a horrible death. The people wanted to oppose her, but were far too scared of her power to do so.

Her next order of business was to have the Dai Li as her personal badgermoles, willing to follow her order to the letter and fetch her anything she wanted that she did not want to get up for, as well as keep their ears to the ground for any talk of escape or rebellion.

The people feared her absolute rule. A few tried to tunnel an escape or climb the wall to freedom. However, they were quickly sensed by Toph, stopped, then executed by means of slowly being crushed under her grimy foot as she laughed. If she was ever bored, she would order the Dai Li to bring her a few citizens to worship her and clean her sweat. Any grabbed for this task were pittied by the people when they finally descended.

Soon, almost all of the city had become acquinted with some part of her or another, with Toph laughing as she watched them walk down the palace steps, heads held low in shame. Finally, the palace was complete, now big enough to support the new queen that stay there with a bed made just her size. Now this was a life. Toph thought.

What happens next?
15533331211111121221211.title: A New Palace

choices: Toph Gives More Specifications and Construction Begins
Toph Wants More Than Just a Foot Temple...
155333312111111212212111.content:
It was a particularly hot day, and Toph was relaxing like a true queen. She was laying back on a cushion, having several servants fan her with palm fronds and feed her fruit.

The giantess was emitting quite the aroma. The gigantic tomboy hadn't bathed in quite some time. Combined with the seeming heat wave Ba Sing Se was going through, that made for one sweaty and stinky queen.

Of course this just made it all the more fun for Toph to torment her unwilling subjects. But today was such a scorcher that she felt like relaxing and trying to cool off.

Toph smirked as she swallowed more grapes, she could sense the disgust of her servants from the close proximity of her stench. She loved how they were too afraid to complain and that they were just standing there being overwhelmed by her b.o.

However, Toph felt something was missing about her rule. As she took a sip of the iced tea offered to her, she wiggled her toes and felt the sweaty moisture and grime.

It suddenly hit Toph, "That's it!" The blind queen exclaimed, sitting upright with a delighted grin on her young face.

The servants were startled, but didn't drop her refreshments...heaven knows they didn't want to be crushed or eaten.

But whatever the giantess was so thrilled about couldn't be good for them.

"Outta my way, dorks! I gotta speak with the royal construction shrimps!" Toph boomed as she stood up and wandered out of the room. Her feet left moist imprints on the marble floor, and the servants cringed at the sickening wet slaps of her soles smacking down.

The 'royal construction shrimps' were actually the crew who were her first slaves and the cause of her being enormous in the first place. They were the ones who built the enormous palace, and it seemed Toph had a new project in mind for them..despite the heat of the day.

The crew was on their lunch break, having been rebuilding some of the shops and homes that Toph had destroyed on one of her rampages...and there had been many.

The earth vibrated beneath their feet in a sort of rhythm..they groaned. That could only mean their queen cometh.

Sure enough, the ripe stink of b.o and foot funk signaled her arrival. Her rancid peds stomped down before them as she stood above with a smug grin, hands on her hips.

The poor men just lost their appetite and tossed their remaining lunch into the trash. "What can we do for-" The 'new foreman' asked.

"I want a temple! One dedicated to my glorious feet!" Toph interrupted rudely.

"Certainly, do you have any specifications?" The foreman knew better than to refuse or put up a fight. He'd been there when the previous foreman got devoured.

"It needs to have big gold statues outside the joint, perfect replicas of these bad boys!" Toph wiggled her plump toes, fanning foot air all around.
155333312111111212212111.title: Foot Temple

1553333121111112122121111.content:
"Of course, my queen." The foreman says, fighting the urge to cough as the smell wafted over hum even stronger. "Is there anything else you wish?"

"Duh. I was thinking there be a large marble foundation inside, with a golden statue of me as the center. Only instead of regular water, this fountain would pump out pure foot sweat, and its mandatory to drink from it when you enter the temple." She explains.

The foreman shuddered internally at such an idea. Not only would people be forced to drink the salty liquid, but some poor soul would have to be charged with refilling it, which meant getting it right from the source. "It will be done. What else?" He asks.

"I want a big door in the back. Big enough for me to slide my feet in so thr people can worship them directly." She tells him while picturing herself with her feet inside as everyone in there was forced to kiss and lick away at them.

"Would that be all, my queen?" The foreman asks.

"From you? Yeah. Now get to work." She says before stomping away to find one of her Dai Li agents.

She managed to find one on the way back to the palace. "Hey you." She booms, getting his attention. "I got a job for you. You're pretty well-informed about the people of this city, right?"

"Y-yes my queen." He stutters.

"Good. Go into town and find the most devoted worshipper of me you can and bring him before my throne." She instructs.

"Yes my queen." He replies before running off. Toph then re-entered the palace to wait.

*****

After about an hour or so, her men returned with a young man, close to her age in tow. They pushed him before her and fled when she signaled them to leave. "So, you're the one my men claim are the most devoted to me? Prove it." She says as she senses his heart.

At the command, he quickly scrambled to his knees and rushed her outstretched foot, wasting no time peppering it with kisses. Toph sensed his heartbeat. It was raised, but not out of fear, it was from pleasure. "Heh, looks like they were right. You're enjoying this, aren't you?" She asks him.

She could feel him nod meekly in her presence. "Good, because you are just the kind of guy I need to run my new foot temple." She tells him, making him perk up.

"R-really?! Th-thank you my queen." He says as he bows on his hands and knees. "What shall my duties be?"

"Well, first off, you'll be teaching people to love worshipping my feet. Attendance is mandatory at least once a day. When they enter, they are to drink from the fountain inside. After you finish preaching, they must each eat a spoonful of my toejam before they may leave. Should I ever stick my feet into the temple, everyone in attendance at the time must worship them." She explains. "Anyone that breaks these rules will be punished by being locked into a small metal box where pure foot stench will be pumped inside."

"It will be done, my queen." He says.

What happens next?
1553333121111112122121111.title: Toph's Specifications

choices: "Time to Harvest The Foot Sweat and Toejam for Opening Ceremony!"
15533331211111121221211111.content:
Within a week or more, the magnificent Foot Temple had been completed. The foreman and his workers were exhausted, they had been worked nonstop by the queen to built this thing..now they only hoped she approved it.

The ground quaked as her majesty Toph approached to begin her inspection. "Hmm..." She hummed as she walked slowly around the structure, it was built with marble within as requested. The outside was built with wood but painted with her signature colors of green and gold.

"Painting it like my outfit...nice touch." She boomed with a nod. The foreman and his men felt a weight lift from their shoulders, that is until Toph squatted down to 'look' inside.

"Hmmm, let's 'see'...so to speak." She snickered at her own joke. Her earth sense had gotten so strong that the nerves in her eyes could start to make out a bit of detail.

She was still blind though, it's just that her Earth Sense had become heightened with her growth spurts. Sure enough, the golden statue of her was in the center. It was an impressive work, she could sense that it depicted her with her mighty foot raised over the basin.

The foot sweat would flow most fittingly out from between the statue's bare toes. She nodded as she turned her attention to 'see' the altar and the rows of pews, then the table where her freshly harvested toejam would be splatted on in a big pile.

Licking her lips in anticipation, she stood back up to her full height. "Great job, guys...now..."
15533331211111121221211111.title: A Temple for Toph's Feet

choices: She respects his forwardness and lets him get back to work
She's angry and wants yo punish him
155333312111111212212111111.content:
"If this place is opening up soon, we're gonna need to extract the stuff we need to serve for the opening." Toph says as she begins to stretch. "I guess that means these puppies will need to be harvested." She says while wiggling her toes.

The new foreman shuddered at the idea of him and his crew being the ones stuck with that job. Unfortunately, his subtle shakes were felt by Toph's seismic sense. But, she seemed unphased by this reaction. "Relax shrimpy. I've already got some people to handle it." She says before stomping off.

She returns to her palace to sense her new high priest awaiting her arrival along with several new followers behind him. "Ah, my queen. I am glad to see your return." He says as he and the others bow at her feet.

"Heh, you know it." She scoffs as she enjoys having subjects bow to her willingly. "Listen up you lot. Today's the big day. My foot temple is finally finished."

The crowd hoot and cheer at the news they've been waiting to hear all week. "Yeah yeah, I know, I'm great." She brags. "But in preparation for the opening, we need foot sweat for the fountain, and toejam to serve the people as they leave, and you lot are gonna do it."

"Whatever you need from us, my queen." The high priest says.

"Well, get to work then." She orders as she sits down on her throne and props her feet up. At her command, the tiny servants get moving.

They rush out to get stacks of buckets, tubs, and tools to properly harvest the substances from her feet. They rush at the meaty soles. Some of them began pressing their hands into her feet, causing her sweat to flow out into the tubs. Meanwhile, the others climbed up to her toes with scrapers in hand as they began scraping toe gunk into small buckets.

Most people would normally be choking and heaving at the smell of her feet, especially at her toes. But these guys, they were something different. Either they were completely noseblind, or they actually found the horrible smell of her feet endearing. Either way, container after container of her sweat and toejam was filled and shipped off to the temple.

Toph sighed in relief as she felt all their tiny hands work away at her feet willingly. Then she felt something different on her sole. A pair of lips pressed against her foot. She gave no orders for foot worship. She needed to know who was responsible for this. Using her seismic sense, she could tell that it wasn't the high priest, but instead one of the lower followers.

Using her earthbending, she shoots up a pillar with the now frightened man at the top. All the others stopped and stared in fear of what was about to happen to him. "Did you just kiss my foot without permission?" She asks him as he shakily nods in fear.

How does she take this?
155333312111111212212111111.title: Harvest Time

choices: Skip to the day of the opening
Someone shows up to oppose Toph
1553333121111112122121111111.content:
"Hehehe. Not bad, runt. I respect you taking a little initiative there." She says, making the scared man sigh in relief as he was lowered back down to ground level.

"In fact, the rest of you should take notes. You guys should start kissing my feet while you work." She demands. With that order, everyone got back to harvesting from her feet, kissing up and down her flesh as they worked. Soon, there were no more containers left to fill.

"It is done, my goddess." The high priest says as he pants in exhaustion. "We are ready."

"Good to hear, and it feels like you boys did a good job cleaning these bad girls up." She says while wiggling her toes. "Now start getting that stuff down to the temple. We're going to need everything set up as soon as possible." She commands.

The men get to work pushing the tubs and carrying the buckets out of the palace, leaving only Toph by herself. "Looks like everything is coming together nicely." She says to herself as she sits back down on her throne.

"Now to just kick back and wait for the big day." She claps her hands, signaling her servants to roll out her custom made footstool. Once it was set up in front of her, she propped her feet right up. "Ahhh. This is the life."

As she relaxed, she reached down to her feet to better inspect their work. Sure enough, her feet were now completely dry without losing any of their softness. Running a finger between her toes uncovers her not feeling a single speck of toejam. "Dang. Looks like those guys really did do a good job." She says before stretching and leaning back once more.

What happens next?
1553333121111112122121111111.title: She Did Want Worship

1553333122.content: Are you one of the characters or just a random person?
1553333122.title: Finds a Shrunken Person!

1553333123.content: Perhaps Toph herself shrinks or grows in an alternate plot?
1553333123.title: other

choices: Toph Takes the Potion and Grows Instantly!
15533331232.content:
Toph sloshed the mysterious liquid in the vial she was handed moments ago. The shop she found herself in was one of those that held varying trinkets of questionable origin.

However, the Blind Bandit felt herself drawn to the shop. The shopkeep seemed to be a fan of her Earth Rumble career. He offered her a 'booster' for practically nothing.

"Why would I, the great Blind Bandit, need something like this?" She questioned with a haughty air.

"W-well it would allow you to become powerful enough that you could take on any opponent...even outside of the realm of Earth Bending." The man meekly explained.

"Oh? And who's to say I can't already?" She smirked, enjoying toying with this fanboy.

"Oh! Um..." The man stumbled over himself. "It supposedly increases your size over time."

"My size, huh? So I'll be a giant and stomp any of those lame-o's underfoot? Sweet. I'll take it!" Toph couldn't help but have her doubts about what the man was saying, but he was offering it for a song due to being star-struck by her.

"Great! Now remember your side of the bargain!" The man gave the blind girl a piece of paper.

Toph rolled her eyes, "Yeah yeah. Autograph and all that." She quickly snatched the piece of parchment and lay it on the floor before stomping her plump sole down on it.

Upon removing her foot and the paper that was now adhered via her sweat...she presented him with a perfect footprint of her big stomper. "There. Now you can brag to your customers that the Blind Bandit graced you with an autograph! Ha ha!" She declared with a boisterous laugh, stomping out of the store with her prize.
15533331232.title: Toph Grows (Alt path)

choices: Go to the earth bending arena
Just head to the next town over
155333312321.content:
Toph looks at the vial for a little bit and wonders what will happen once she drinks it. She could just toy with those losers at the earth bending arena. Or she could go and take over a town or more just for the fun of it.

“Well,” Toph opens the vial awaiting to drink it all up. “Bottoms up.”

Toph took a big sip of the potion and gags once she finds out the taste was horrible.

“Geez. If you’re gonna make a potion, the least you could do is make it not taste like a sweaty old man.” Toph said in disappointment.

That’s when she felt her body starting to tingle. It means that it must be working. It is as her body instantly starts to grow larger in a fast pace. She then was standing at about 50 feet and was feeling very exciting about this. Surprising that her clothes grew with her. But she’s not complaining.

“This is going to be so awesome. Now what should I do first?” Toph wondered with a smirk.
155333312321.title: The Blind Giantess

choices: Toph Squeezes Her Way In and The Tournament Starts!
1553333123211.content:
Deciding upon showing off her new size and power at the Earth Rumble Arena, Toph set off in the direction of it. Her gigantic bare feet shook the ground, and the citizens of Gaoling looked in awe of her.

Using her seismic sense to detect the people staring, she felt her ego swell up to mountainous heights. "Yeah, comin' through! Make way for the new and improved me!" She boomed proudly.

=Earth Rumble Arena=

Xin Fu was looking around anxiously. "Where the heck is she?! She's my star! My champion! She surely wouldn't bail out on me...would she?" The greedy host of the Earth Rumble tournament wrung his hands.

As the crowds of patrons filtered in to the bleachers, Xin Fu grew more nervous. That was when the entire building began to shake repeatedly.

"Oh what now?!" Xin Fu swore as he went to investigate.

The audience was growing restless, and the seeming earthquake wasn't helping things. As Xin Fu exited the building, he ran right in to a squishy and quite odorous blockage.

Pinching his nose, he looked up to see it was Toph's toes and looking up...and up...he saw the Blind Bandit herself grinning smugly. "Hope I'm not too late, Xin Fu." She chuckled wryly.

"B-blind Bandit!?" Xin Fu yelped.

"Nahh, that name's for the old me. I think BIG Bandit suits me more now." She was half-joking.
1553333123211.title: Talk About an Earth RUMBLE!

choices: Skip to the end of the tournament
15533331232111.content:
“Now make room, little man.” Toph joked as she bends down to crawl into the entrance of the arena only to find herself stuck in the entrance way.

“Uh. One second please.” Toph said before she earth bended the doorway wide enough for her to enter. “Much better.”

Toph finally got inside and makes her way to the ring. Everyone there was in awe when they see the gigantic Blind Bandit entering the ring. This makes them very worried about her opponents as the match was about to start.

“Ladies and Gentlemen! Introducing your champion, The Blind-!” Xin Fu stopped when Toph gave him a stink eye. “I-I mean, The Big Bandit!” Xin Fu announced while Toph smirked.

“And don’t you forget it.” Toph said as she shows the belt on her finger as if she was wearing a ring.

“And introducing her opponent! He is none other than The Boulder!” Xin Fu announced while the big muscular earth-bender steps in seeming to not being intimidated by her new size.

“The Boulder will admit that he is surprised by your size, Big Bandit! But you’ll know that size isn’t everything.” The Boulder said with confidence.

“Isn’t that what all the girls tell you?” Toph mocked and the crowd OOOH’d at that statement.

“Just for that, The Boulder will turn you into a giant ruble of slag.” The Boulder said mad about what Toph just said.

“I love to see you try, The Pebble.” Toph said before giving Xin Fu the belt and the match has now started.

The Boulder makes the first shot by firing a big chunk of earth at Toph. However, when it hit her, it hardly phased her.

“Is that all you got?” Toph wondered not feeling amused.

The Boulder does a different approach and tries lifting her up to throw her out of the ring. But she was too heavy as he couldn’t lift her up an inch. This is bad news for The Boulder.

“Oh! Is it my turn now?” Toph said as she used her feet and basic earth bending to knock The Boulder out of the ring with ease.

Turns out her basic bending is stronger while in this height and Toph likes it a lot.

“Okay. Who’s next?” Toph asked as she’s ready for more.
15533331232111.title: The Big Bandit’s Debut

choices: Find the Avatar and his friends
Get back at the Fire Nation
15533331311.content:
At the Fire Nation asylum, we see Azula shackled up in an isolated room where she’s busy boiling her mind with such anger. Everything she worked hard for, everything she had build from scratch, all of it. Gone. All of her efforts went straight down the toilet. 1553333222.content:
It was an ordinary day in republic city. People were going to work, kids were going to school and the spirits were living in harmony with the humans. It was truly a tranquil time.

It was also an ordinary day for the CEO of future industries. Ms Asami Sato. This young lady was in her early twenties. She was tall, beautiful, kind and above all very intelligent. She and her company had contributed so much to the world, it was amazing how far they’d come in just a short number of years.

But work never stopped for Asami as she was always working towards the future. As of late she had been trying to reduce cost of shipping and handling all of her products. Right now they were spending way too much in this. She ad been trying to think of a way to do this.

Then a couple of months ago she had a brainstorm and wondered if she could find a way to make things smaller then that would drastically reduce the cont and amount of shipping she would have to do. Hell she could make it so things were small enough to all be delivered in one delivery.

But she wasn’t going to stop with just products and materials, imagine how much easier society could manage if they could change the size of everything! This included human animals and spirits alike!

With this resolve Asami set herself the task for the next few months in solely making her idea a reality. And today was finally that day.

In her office Asami took out her size changing device, it looked like a remote one would use to watch movers but it had a bright bulb at the end that a beam would emit from and reduce its target in size. She hadn’t thought of name yet but she was tempted to call it an Asami ray...

Pointing it at her chair she took a deep breath and pressed the shrink button. A green beam shot out of the remote and struck the chair, to her delight the chair began to dwindle in size immedietly. In git smaller and smaller until it was only an inch tall.

Clapping her hands together in delight she walked over to the chair and picked it up, it had retained all its characteristics only now it was tiny. Smiling she placed it down again and switched her remote to grow. Talking another deep breath she slowly aimed and pushed the button.

Once again to her delight she saw the chair growing bigger and bigger until it was back to normal size!

“Oh my god it works! It actually works! This Asami ray of mine is gonna change the world forever! But I should see if it works on a oeeson as well...” Asami said.

She sat down at her desk and began to think of who would be the perfect guinea pig, she would love to test it on herself but the thought of something found wrong and being tiny forever didnt appeal to her. That’s when she had an idea. Turning her intercom on she made a quick announcement.

“Attention this is your CEO Asami Sato speaking. Will Van please report to my office please. Thank you.”

Sitting back she waited until there was a knock on her door.

“Come in!’ Asami said cheerfully.

In walked one of future industries newest interns Van. He was 18 years old, he was also quite short for a man at only 5ft tall. Hell Asami was at least a foot taller than him without her heels on. That being said he was also quite handsome for his size and was a hard worker and always looking to impress her. She was sure he’d be the perfect guinea pig.

“Y-you wanted to see me Miss Sato” Van said nervously.

“Yes thank you for coming so promptly. Relax by the way Van you’re not in trouble or anything” Asami said with a reassuring smile.

Van sighed in relief and toom the seat that was offered to him. Asami then went through her proposal of shrinking him in order to ensure the device was safe. She told him he would immediately be restored to normal height and that no harm would to him. She also threw in a little white lie by saying she had tested several other people an animals alrwady and that he was just a final test before release.

Van listened intently whilst nodding and asking the occasional question. He lit up when Asami said he’d be given a permanent job at the company for doing this and also she mentioned that when she grew him back she’d add some inches to his height!

Now Asami wasn’t even sure that she could grow something beyond its original height but she thought it would sweeten the deal. And she was right, after ten minutes Van was conviced and stood in the middle of the room awaiting the start of the test.

“Ok I’m all set Miss Sato.”

“Thank you Van. And please call me Asami” Asami said with a reassuring smile.

“Yes Miss Sa..Er I mean yes miss Asami” Van replied shyly.

Asami smiled again and pointed the Asami ray at Van and pressed the button. The green beam shot out of the remote and struck Van. Once more to her delight Van was shrinking in size!

However Asami never mentioned to Van how small she intended to make him. She could start off somewhat small just in case things go wrong, or she could see how far she could go in order to determine her Asami rays power.

In the end Van was shunk too...

**********

Hibiki sat on the couch and you somehow were now hovering in front of a normal sized chalkboard in her living room. "Uh...where did that come...y'know what nevermind." She sweatdrops.

"Kay. First things first, I want you to stop thinking about it like a 'diet'." You say to her. Hibiki blinked in confusion, "Huh? What do you mean?"

Hibiki looked VERY relieved now and paid attention. "Okay, what you want to do is pay attention to labels. Like, let's say you want to buy a food product. If the ingredients list is as long as your arm and has a bunch of words you can't pronounce...probably shouldn't buy it..at least not too often. Try to find organic substitutes though." You say.

"Luckily for you you CAN eat the things you enjoy on this plan. Just maybe tone it down a bit and don't eat so many helpings or whatever." You say as you continue to scribble on the board.

"For example, let's say you're at a birthday party. You love chocolate cake, so instead of guilt tripping yourself and attaching shame to certain foods...you can just have one smaller piece instead of two huge ones." You explain.

"Really? That's it?" Hibiki asks in disbelief.

"Well the key here is moderation." You write the word on the board. "If you deprive yourself of foods you REALLY love it's a proven fact that you're more likely to sabatoge yourself in the long run." You say.

1553333332223323323333111.content:
"So what's the deal with this outsider?" Zhu Rong asks as she stands before a prisoner her soldiers brought to her.

"Ma'am. We found him not far from the village. He claims to be a sorcerer." One soldier says, keeping his blade to the man's throat.

"Please mistress. Spare my life. Do so and I shall show you what miracles the Heavens have to offer." The man pleads.

"Oh really? And just what sort of miracle can convince me to trust you?" She asks as she kneels down to look him in the eye.

"Allow me to stand, and I shall show you the might of the Heavens." He continues. "I can give you power beyond what you currently know."

"Is that so? Well I hate to break it to you, but I'm already a descendant of the god of fire himself, so I'm already strong as it is." She boasts.

"Such heresy! You know not what the Heavens have to offer. Allow me to rise, and you shall see true power flow like nothing else." He yells.

The tanned woman chuckles at his comments. "Very well then. Let him stand men. Let's see what he's got." She orders, causing her men to stand back.

"Very good. Now witness the power of the Heavens!" He yells as he waves his hands at Zhu Rong. Almost immediately she felt a sensation flow throughout her body. She clutched her head a bit in pain.

Her troops, thinking this was an attack, began to rush the sorcerer. Only to stop in their tracks as they see what was actually happening. Their queen was growing larger and larger. Soon, her body began to surpass the jungle treeline. She knelt down as her body continued to get bigger. Unfortunately for the sorcerer, her knee found itself landing right where he stood, crushing him and causing the spell to stop.

With the feeling subsided, Zhu Rong finally rose to her now larger feet. Her head now looked over the trees as she could see for miles. "Well, guess you weren't full of it after all." She says as she looks down to where the man stood, only to see a red spot surrounded by her troops. "Tough break for him, then." She says. "Now then, what to do?"
